trans-unit.source: Represents a business object that provides data to data-bound controls in multitier Web application architectures.
trans-unit.target: 表示为多层 Web 应用程序体系结构中的数据绑定控件提供数据的业务对象。

trans-unit.target: 本主题内容：

trans-unit.source: Introduction
trans-unit.target: 介绍

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> control works with a class that you create.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>控件的工作方式与你创建的类。

trans-unit.source: You create methods that retrieve and update data, and you provide the names of those methods to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> control in markup.
trans-unit.target: 创建方法用于检索和更新数据，并提供到这些方法的名称<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>标记中的控件。

trans-unit.source: During rendering or postback processing, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> calls the methods that you have specified.
trans-unit.target: 在呈现或回发的处理过程<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>调用具有指定的方法。

trans-unit.source: There is no visual rendering of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> control.
trans-unit.target: 没有没有可视化呈现<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>控件。

trans-unit.source: As a result, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> does not support visual features such as the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceControl.EnableTheming%2A> or <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceControl.SkinID%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 因此，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>不支持 visual 功能，如<xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceControl.EnableTheming%2A>或<xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceControl.SkinID%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: Purpose
trans-unit.target: 目标

trans-unit.source: A very common application design practice is to separate the presentation layer from business logic and to encapsulate the business logic in business objects.
trans-unit.target: 非常常见的应用程序设计做法是将表示层单独从业务逻辑，封装业务对象中的业务逻辑。

trans-unit.source: These business objects form a distinct layer between the presentation layer and the data tier, resulting in a three-tier application architecture.
trans-unit.target: 这些业务对象的窗体之间在表示层和数据层，从而导致三层应用程序体系结构的不同层。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> control enables developers to use an ASP.NET data source control while retaining their three-tier application architecture.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>控件使开发人员能够在保留其三层应用程序体系结构的同时使用 ASP.NET 数据源控件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> control uses reflection to create instances of business objects and to call methods on them to retrieve, update, insert, and delete data.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>控件使用反射来创建业务对象的实例，以对其检索，调用方法更新、 插入和删除数据。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.TypeName%2A> property identifies the name of the class that the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> works with.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.TypeName%2A>属性标识的类名称，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>配合。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> control creates and destroys an instance of the class for each method call; it does not hold the object in memory for the lifetime of the Web request.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>控件创建和销毁为每个方法调用的类的实例; 它不保存该对象在内存中的 Web 请求的生存期内。

trans-unit.source: This is a serious consideration if the business object that you use requires many resources or is otherwise expensive to create and destroy.
trans-unit.target: 如果你使用的业务对象需要多资源或将否则占用大量资源来创建和销毁，这是在仔细考虑。

trans-unit.source: Using an expensive object might not be an optimal design choice, but you can control the life cycle of the object by using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.ObjectCreating>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.ObjectCreated>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.ObjectDisposing> events.
trans-unit.target: 使用的高开销对象可能不是最佳设计选择，但你可以通过使用控制对象的生命周期<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.ObjectCreating>， <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.ObjectCreated>，和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.ObjectDisposing>事件。

trans-unit.source: The methods that are identified by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.SelectMethod%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.UpdateMethod%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.InsertMethod%2A>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.DeleteMethod%2A> properties can be instance methods or `static` (`Shared` in Visual Basic) methods.
trans-unit.target: 由标识的方法<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.SelectMethod%2A>， <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.UpdateMethod%2A>， <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.InsertMethod%2A>，和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.DeleteMethod%2A>属性可以是实例方法或`static`(`Shared`在 Visual Basic 中) 方法。

trans-unit.source: If the methods are `static` (`Shared` in Visual Basic), an instance of the business object is not created, and the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.ObjectCreating>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.ObjectCreated>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.ObjectDisposing> events are not raised.
trans-unit.target: 如果方法是`static`(`Shared`在 Visual Basic 中)，未创建业务对象的实例，与<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.ObjectCreating>， <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.ObjectCreated>，和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.ObjectDisposing>不会引发事件。

trans-unit.source: Retrieving Data
trans-unit.target: 检索数据

trans-unit.source: To retrieve data from a business object, set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.SelectMethod%2A> property to the name of the method that retrieves data.
trans-unit.target: 若要从业务对象中检索数据，将设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.SelectMethod%2A>属性中检索数据的方法的名称。

trans-unit.source: If the method does not return an <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable> or <xref:System.Data.DataSet> object, the object is wrapped by the runtime in an <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable> collection.
trans-unit.target: 如果方法不返回<xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable>或<xref:System.Data.DataSet>对象，该对象包装由运行时在<xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable>集合。

trans-unit.source: If the method signature has parameters, you can add <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter> objects to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.SelectParameters%2A> collection, and then bind them to the values that you want to pass to the method that is specified by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.SelectMethod%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 如果方法签名具有参数，你可以添加<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter>对象添加到<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.SelectParameters%2A>集合，然后将它们绑定到你想要将传递给由指定的方法的值<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.SelectMethod%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: In order for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> control to use the parameters, the parameters must match the names and types of the parameters in the method signature.
trans-unit.target: 为了使<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>控制要使用参数，参数必须与匹配的名称和类型的方法签名中的参数。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Using Parameters with the ObjectDataSource Control](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/45fb67ee-9be7-49b7-9421-e242203dafa4).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[ObjectDataSource 控件与使用参数](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/45fb67ee-9be7-49b7-9421-e242203dafa4)。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> control retrieves data whenever the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Select%2A> method is called.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>控件中检索数据时<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Select%2A>调用方法。

trans-unit.source: This method provides programmatic access to the method that is specified by <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.SelectMethod%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 此方法提供以编程方式访问由指定的方法<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.SelectMethod%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: The method that is specified by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.SelectMethod%2A> property is called automatically by controls that are bound to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> when their `DataBind` method is called.
trans-unit.target: 通过指定的方法<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.SelectMethod%2A>属性将自动调用绑定到控件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>时其`DataBind`调用方法。

trans-unit.source: If you set the `DataSourceID` property of a data-bound control, the control automatically binds to data from the data source, as needed.
trans-unit.target: 如果你设置`DataSourceID`数据绑定控件的属性，该控件自动将绑定到数据从数据源中，根据需要。

trans-unit.source: Setting the `DataSourceID` property is the recommended method for binding an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> control to a data-bound control.
trans-unit.target: 设置`DataSourceID`属性是绑定的建议的方法<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>到数据绑定控件的控件。

trans-unit.source: Alternatively, you can set the `DataSource` property, but then you must explicitly call the `DataBind` method of the data-bound control.
trans-unit.target: 或者，您可以设置`DataSource`属性，但你必须显式调用`DataBind`的数据绑定控件的方法。

trans-unit.source: You can call the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Select%2A> method programmatically at any time to retrieve data.
trans-unit.target: 你可以调用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Select%2A>随时以编程方式检索数据的方法。

trans-unit.source: For more information about binding data-bound controls to data source controls, see [Binding to Data Using a Data Source Control](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/e41adfff-8fb8-449e-9cd1-9bd49788c5f7).
trans-unit.target: 有关将数据绑定控件绑定到数据源控件的详细信息，请参阅[数据源控件绑定到数据使用](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/e41adfff-8fb8-449e-9cd1-9bd49788c5f7)。

trans-unit.source: Performing Data Operations
trans-unit.target: 执行数据操作

trans-unit.source: Depending on the capabilities of the business object that the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> control works with, you can perform data operations, such as updates, insertions, and deletions.
trans-unit.target: 具体取决于业务的功能对象<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>控件使用的工作方式，可以执行数据操作，例如更新、 插入和删除。

trans-unit.source: To perform these data operations, set the appropriate method name and any associated parameters for the operation that you want to perform.
trans-unit.target: 若要执行这些数据操作，请设置相应的方法名称和任何关联的参数为你想要执行的操作。

trans-unit.source: For example, for an update operation, set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.UpdateMethod%2A> property to the name of the business object method that performs updates and add any required parameters to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.UpdateParameters%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: 例如，对于更新操作，设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.UpdateMethod%2A>属性的名称的业务对象方法执行更新以及添加任何所需参数为<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.UpdateParameters%2A>集合。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> control is associated with a data-bound control, the parameters are added by the data-bound control.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>与数据绑定控件关联的控件时，参数添加数据绑定控件。

trans-unit.source: In this case, you need to ensure that the parameter names of the method match the field names in the data-bound control.
trans-unit.target: 在这种情况下，你需要确保该方法的参数名称匹配的数据绑定控件中的字段名称。

trans-unit.source: The update is performed when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Update%2A> method is called, either explicitly by your code or automatically by a data-bound control.
trans-unit.target: 执行更新时<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Update%2A>显式由你的代码或通过数据绑定控件自动调用方法。

trans-unit.source: The same general pattern is followed for <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Delete%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Insert%2A> operations.
trans-unit.target: 都将执行相同的常规模式<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Delete%2A>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Insert%2A>操作。

trans-unit.source: Business objects are assumed to perform these types of data operations one record at a time, rather than batched.
trans-unit.target: 业务对象被认为执行这些类型的数据操作一条记录一次，而不是批处理。

trans-unit.source: Filtering Data
trans-unit.target: 筛选数据

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> control can filter data that is retrieved by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.SelectMethod%2A> property, if the data is returned as a <xref:System.Data.DataSet> or <xref:System.Data.DataTable> object.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>控件可以筛选将检索的数据<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.SelectMethod%2A>属性，如果返回的数据为<xref:System.Data.DataSet>或<xref:System.Data.DataTable>对象。

trans-unit.source: You can set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.FilterExpression%2A> property to a filtering expression by using a format string syntax and bind values in the expression to parameters that are specified in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.FilterParameters%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: 你可以设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.FilterExpression%2A>属性筛选表达式中，通过使用格式字符串语法，并将值绑定到参数中指定的表达式中<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.FilterParameters%2A>集合。

trans-unit.source: Caching
trans-unit.target: 缓存

trans-unit.source: Although the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> does not retain the instance of the business object across multiple requests, it can cache the result of calling the method identified by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.SelectMethod%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 尽管<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>不会保留实例的跨多个请求的业务对象，它可以缓存调用由标识的方法的结果<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.SelectMethod%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: While the data is cached, subsequent calls to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Select%2A> method return the cached data instead of creating the business object and calling its <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.SelectMethod%2A> using reflection.
trans-unit.target: 在数据缓存，因为在后续调用过程<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Select%2A>方法返回缓存的数据，而不是创建的业务对象，然后调用其<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.SelectMethod%2A>使用反射。

trans-unit.source: Caching lets you avoid creating the object and calling its data method at the expense of memory on the Web server.
trans-unit.target: 缓存可避免创建对象并调用 Web 服务器上的内存为代价其数据方法。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> automatically caches data when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.EnableCaching%2A> property is set to `true`, and the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.CacheDuration%2A> property is set to the number of seconds that the cache stores data before the cache is discarded.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>自动缓存数据时<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.EnableCaching%2A>属性设置为`true`，和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.CacheDuration%2A>属性设置为在缓存中存储数据丢弃缓存之前的秒数。

trans-unit.source: You can also specify a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.CacheExpirationPolicy%2A> property and an optional <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.SqlCacheDependency%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 你还可以指定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.CacheExpirationPolicy%2A>属性和可选<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.SqlCacheDependency%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> control allows you to cache all types of data, but you should not cache objects that retain resources or state that cannot be shared to service multiple requests (for example, an open <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDataReader> object), because the same instance of the object will be used to service multiple requests.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>控制可以缓存所有类型的数据，但不是应都缓存保留资源或不能共享多个请求提供服务的状态的对象 (例如，打开<xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDataReader>对象)，因为该对象的同一个实例将用于多个请求提供服务。

trans-unit.source: Features
trans-unit.target: 功能

trans-unit.source: The following table describes the features of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> control.
trans-unit.target: 下表介绍的功能<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>控件。

trans-unit.source: Capability
trans-unit.target: 功能

trans-unit.source: Requirements
trans-unit.target: 惠?

trans-unit.source: Selecting
trans-unit.target: 选择

trans-unit.source: Set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.SelectMethod%2A> property to the name of the business object method that selects data, and include any necessary parameters in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.SelectParameters%2A> collection either programmatically or by using a data-bound control.
trans-unit.target: 设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.SelectMethod%2A>属性的名称的业务对象方法中选择数据，并包含在任何必需的参数<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.SelectParameters%2A>集合以编程方式或通过使用数据绑定控件。

trans-unit.source: Sorting
trans-unit.target: 排序

trans-unit.source: Set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.SortParameterName%2A> property to the name of the parameter in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.SelectMethod%2A> method that carries the sort criteria.
trans-unit.target: 设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.SortParameterName%2A>属性中的参数的名称<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.SelectMethod%2A>带有排序条件的方法。

trans-unit.source: Filtering
trans-unit.target: 筛选

trans-unit.source: Set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.FilterExpression%2A> property to a filtering expression and optionally add any parameters to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.FilterParameters%2A> collection to filter the data when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Select%2A> method is called.
trans-unit.target: 设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.FilterExpression%2A>属性为一个筛选表达式和 （可选） 添加到任何参数<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.FilterParameters%2A>集合来筛选的数据时<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Select%2A>调用方法。

trans-unit.source: The method specified by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.SelectMethod%2A> property must return a <xref:System.Data.DataSet> or <xref:System.Data.DataTable>.
trans-unit.target: 指定的方法<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.SelectMethod%2A>属性必须返回<xref:System.Data.DataSet>或<xref:System.Data.DataTable>。

trans-unit.source: Paging
trans-unit.target: 分页

trans-unit.source: Data source paging is supported, if the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.SelectMethod%2A> method contains parameters for the maximum number of records to retrieve and the index of the first record to retrieve.
trans-unit.target: 如果支持数据源分页<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.SelectMethod%2A>方法包含要检索的记录的最大数以及要检索的第一个记录的索引的参数。

trans-unit.source: The names of those parameters must be set in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.MaximumRowsParameterName%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.StartRowIndexParameterName%2A> properties, respectively.
trans-unit.target: 这些参数的名称必须设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.MaximumRowsParameterName%2A>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.StartRowIndexParameterName%2A>属性，分别。

trans-unit.source: A data-bound control might be able to perform paging itself, even if the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> control does not support paging directly in the method specified by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.SelectMethod%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 数据绑定控件可能能够执行分页本身，即使<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>控件不支持直接在指定的方法中的分页<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.SelectMethod%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: The requirement for the data-bound control to be able to do this is that the method specified by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.SelectMethod%2A> property return an object that implements the <xref:System.Collections.ICollection> interface.
trans-unit.target: 数据绑定控件能够执行此操作的要求是通过指定的方法<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.SelectMethod%2A>属性返回的对象实现<xref:System.Collections.ICollection>接口。

trans-unit.source: Updating
trans-unit.target: Updating

trans-unit.source: Set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.UpdateMethod%2A> property to the name of the business object method that updates data, and include any necessary parameters in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.UpdateParameters%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: 设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.UpdateMethod%2A>属性的名称的业务对象方法用于更新数据，并包含在任何必需的参数<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.UpdateParameters%2A>集合。

trans-unit.source: Deleting
trans-unit.target: 正在删除

trans-unit.source: Set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.DeleteMethod%2A> property to the name of the business object method or function that deletes data, and include any necessary parameters in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.DeleteParameters%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: 设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.DeleteMethod%2A>属性的名称的业务对象方法或函数删除数据，并包含在任何必需的参数<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.DeleteParameters%2A>集合。

trans-unit.source: Inserting
trans-unit.target: 插入

trans-unit.source: Set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.InsertMethod%2A> property to the name of the business object method or function that inserts data, and include any necessary parameters in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.InsertParameters%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: 设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.InsertMethod%2A>属性的名称的业务对象方法或函数插入数据，并包含在任何必需的参数<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.InsertParameters%2A>集合。

trans-unit.source: Caching
trans-unit.target: 缓存

trans-unit.source: Set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.EnableCaching%2A> property to `true`, and the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.CacheDuration%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.CacheExpirationPolicy%2A> properties according to the caching behavior you want for your cached data.
trans-unit.target: 设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.EnableCaching%2A>属性`true`，和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.CacheDuration%2A>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.CacheExpirationPolicy%2A>根据缓存数据所需的缓存行为的属性。

trans-unit.source: When you use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> class to update or insert data, strings that are entered at the client are not automatically converted from the client culture format to the server culture format.
trans-unit.target: 当你使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>类来更新或插入数据，在客户端上输入的字符串不自动转换从客户端的区域性格式为服务器区域性格式。

trans-unit.source: For example, the client culture might specify DD/MM/YYYY as the date format, and the date format on the server might be MM/DD/YYYY.
trans-unit.target: 例如，客户端区域性可能会指定 DD/MM/YYYY 作为日期格式，并且在服务器上的日期格式可能 MM/DD/YYYY。

trans-unit.source: In that case, October 5, 2009 would be entered in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBox> control as 5/10/2009 but would be interpreted as May 10, 2009.
trans-unit.target: 在这种情况下，将在输入 2009 年 10 月 5 日<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBox>控件用作 5/10/2009年，但将被解释为 2009 年 5 月 10 日。

trans-unit.source: October 15, 2009 would be entered as 15/10/2009, and would be rejected as an invalid date.
trans-unit.target: 2009 年 10 月 15 日 15/10/2009，如下所示输入，并将被拒绝为无效的日期。

trans-unit.source: Data View
trans-unit.target: 数据视图

trans-unit.source: As with all data source controls, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> control is associated with a data source view class.
trans-unit.target: 与所有数据源控件，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>控件所关联的数据源视图类。

trans-unit.source: While the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> control is the interface that the page developer uses to work with data, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView> class is the interface that data-bound controls work with.
trans-unit.target: 虽然<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>控件是页开发人员用来使用数据的接口<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView>类是数据绑定控件使用的接口。

trans-unit.source: Additionally, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView> class describes the capabilities of the data source control, and performs the actual work.
trans-unit.target: 此外，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView>类描述的数据源控件，功能和执行的实际工作。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> control has only one associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView>, and it is always named `DefaultView`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>控件仅有一个关联<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView>，并且始终名为`DefaultView`。

trans-unit.source: While the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView> object is exposed by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.GetView%2A> method, many of its properties and methods are wrapped and exposed directly by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> control.
trans-unit.target: 虽然<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView>对象公开：<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.GetView%2A>方法，许多其属性和方法的包装，并且将其直接通过公开<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>控件。

trans-unit.source: Behind the scenes, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView> object performs all data operations, including retrieving, inserting, updating, deleting, filtering, and sorting the data.
trans-unit.target: 在后台，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView>对象执行所有的数据操作，包括检索、 插入、 更新、 删除、 筛选和对数据进行排序。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView>.
trans-unit.target: 有关详情，请参阅<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView>。

trans-unit.source: Using LINQ to SQL
trans-unit.target: 使用 LINQ to SQL

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> control with a LINQ to SQL class.
trans-unit.target: 你可以使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>使用 LINQ to SQL 类的控件。

trans-unit.source: To do so, you set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.TypeName%2A> property to the name of the data-context class.
trans-unit.target: 若要执行此操作，你将设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.TypeName%2A>属性数据上下文类的名称。

trans-unit.source: You also set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.SelectMethod%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.UpdateMethod%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.InsertMethod%2A>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.DeleteMethod%2A> methods to the methods in the data-context class that perform the corresponding operations.
trans-unit.target: 你还设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.SelectMethod%2A>， <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.UpdateMethod%2A>， <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.InsertMethod%2A>，和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.DeleteMethod%2A>执行相应操作中的数据上下文类的方法的方法。

trans-unit.source: You must create an event handler for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.ObjectDisposing> event in order to cancel disposing of the data-context class.
trans-unit.target: 你必须创建的事件处理程序<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.ObjectDisposing>才能取消对数据上下文类的释放的事件。

trans-unit.source: This step is necessary because LINQ to SQL supports deferred execution, whereas the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> control tries to dispose the data context after the Select operation.
trans-unit.target: 此步骤是必需的因为 LINQ to SQL 支持延迟的执行，而<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>控件尝试后选择操作释放的数据上下文。

trans-unit.source: For more information about how to create LINQ to SQL classes, see [How to: Create LINQ to SQL Classes in a Web Project](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/20bf925f-2a6d-410d-8f65-7b5b8f555081).
trans-unit.target: 有关如何创建 LINQ to SQL 类的详细信息，请参阅[如何： 创建 LINQ to SQL 类 Web 项目中](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/20bf925f-2a6d-410d-8f65-7b5b8f555081)。

trans-unit.source: For an example of how to cancel the disposing of a data context class, see the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.ObjectDisposing> event.
trans-unit.target: 有关如何取消数据上下文类的释放的示例，请参阅<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.ObjectDisposing>事件。

trans-unit.source: Using the Entity Framework
trans-unit.target: 使用实体框架

trans-unit.source: You can also use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> control with the Entity Framework.
trans-unit.target: 你还可以使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>与实体框架的控件。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Using the Entity Framework and the ObjectDataSource Control](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=209117).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[使用实体框架和 ObjectDataSource 控件](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=209117)。

trans-unit.source: Declarative Syntax
trans-unit.target: 声明性语法

trans-unit.source: A Visual Studio Web site project with source code is available to accompany this topic: [Download](http://code.msdn.microsoft.com/Project/Download/FileDownload.aspx?ProjectName=aspnetmsdnexamples&DownloadId=14838).
trans-unit.target: Visual Studio Web 站点项目与源代码是可用本主题可以附带：[下载](http://code.msdn.microsoft.com/Project/Download/FileDownload.aspx?ProjectName=aspnetmsdnexamples&DownloadId=14838)。

trans-unit.source: This section shows an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> in markup in an .aspx page and it shows the business objects that it works with.
trans-unit.target: 本部分说明<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>中的标记中.aspx 页，它显示适用于的业务对象。

trans-unit.source: The example is the .aspx page.
trans-unit.target: 此示例是.aspx 页面。

trans-unit.source: It contains a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control that is bound to an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> control.
trans-unit.target: 它包含<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>绑定到控件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>控件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> control markup specifies the name of the business object and the name of the business object method to call in order to retrieve data.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>控件标记指定的业务对象的名称和要调用以检索数据的业务对象方法的名称。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows the business object that the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> control in the .aspx page uses.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示的业务对象<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>.aspx 页中的控件使用。

trans-unit.source: (Many other <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> code examples use this business object also.) The example consists of the following two basic classes:
trans-unit.target: (许多其他<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>的代码示例还使用此业务对象。)此示例由以下两个基本类组成：

trans-unit.source: The `EmployeeLogic` class is the business logic class that the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> uses.
trans-unit.target: `EmployeeLogic`类是业务逻辑类<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>使用。

trans-unit.source: The `NorthwindEmployee` class defines the data object that is returned by the `GetAllEmployees` method of the `EmployeeLogic` class.
trans-unit.target: `NorthwindEmployee`类定义数据对象返回`GetAllEmployees`方法`EmployeeLogic`类。

trans-unit.source: An additional `NorthwindDataException` class is provided as a convenience.
trans-unit.target: 附加`NorthwindDataException`类提供为方便起见。

trans-unit.source: This set of example classes works with the Northwind Traders database, which is available with Microsoft SQL Server and Microsoft Access.
trans-unit.target: 这组示例类适用于可用于 Microsoft SQL Server 和 Microsoft Access 的 Northwind Traders 数据库。

trans-unit.source: For a complete working example, you must compile and use these classes with the .aspx page example that is provided.
trans-unit.target: 有关完整的工作示例，必须编译，并使用提供的.aspx 页示例中使用这些类。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to install the Northwind Traders database, see [How to: Install Sample Databases](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ed1291f6-604c-4972-ae22-0345c6dea12e).
trans-unit.target: 有关如何安装 Northwind Traders 数据库的信息，请参阅[如何： 安装示例数据库](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ed1291f6-604c-4972-ae22-0345c6dea12e)。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: The name of the class that the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource" /> works with.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource" /> 使用的类的名称。

trans-unit.source: The name of the method or function that the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource" /> invokes to retrieve data.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource" /> 为检索数据而调用的方法或函数的名称。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource" /> class with the specified type name and data retrieval method name.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的类型名和数据检索方法名初始化 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: The value of the `typeName` parameter can be a partially qualified type for code that is located in the Bin or App_Code directory or a fully qualified type name for code that is registered in the global assembly cache.
trans-unit.target: 值`typeName`参数可以为位于 Bin 或 App_Code 目录中的代码的部分限定的类型或在全局程序集缓存中注册的代码的完全限定的类型名称。

trans-unit.source: If you use the global assembly cache, you must add the appropriate reference to the `assemblies` section of the Machine.config or Web.config configuration file.
trans-unit.target: 如果你使用的全局程序集缓存，你必须添加对相应的引用`assemblies`Machine.config 或 Web.config 配置文件节。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the length of time, in seconds, that the data source control caches data that is retrieved by the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.SelectMethod" /> property.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置以秒为单位的一段时间，数据源控件就在这段时间内缓存 <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.SelectMethod" /> 属性检索到的数据。

trans-unit.source: The number of seconds that the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource" /> caches the results of a <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.SelectMethod" /> property invocation.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource" /> 将 <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.SelectMethod" /> 属性调用的结果缓存的秒数。

trans-unit.source: The default is 0.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 0。

trans-unit.source: The value cannot be negative.
trans-unit.target: 该值不能为负数。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> control supports data caching.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>控件支持数据缓存。

trans-unit.source: While data is cached, calls to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Select%2A> method retrieve data from the cache rather than from the business object that the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> works with.
trans-unit.target: 数据被缓存，调用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Select%2A>方法检索数据从缓存而不是从业务对象<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>配合。

trans-unit.source: When the cache expires, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Select%2A> method retrieves data from the business object, and then caches the data again.
trans-unit.target: 在缓存过期，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Select%2A>方法从业务对象中，检索数据，然后再次缓存的数据。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> control automatically caches data when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.EnableCaching%2A> property is set to `true` and the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.CacheDuration%2A> property is set to a value greater than 0, which indicates the number of seconds that the cache stores data before the cache entry is discarded.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>控件将自动缓存数据时<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.EnableCaching%2A>属性设置为`true`和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.CacheDuration%2A>属性设置为一个值大于 0，指示在缓存中存储数据的缓存项之前的秒数将被丢弃。

trans-unit.source: A value of 0 indicates an infinitely long cache.
trans-unit.target: 值为 0 指示无限期的缓存。

trans-unit.source: The cache is regulated by a combination of the duration and the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.CacheExpirationPolicy%2A> setting.
trans-unit.target: 通过持续时间的组合调整缓存和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.CacheExpirationPolicy%2A>设置。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.CacheExpirationPolicy%2A> property is set to the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceCacheExpiry.Absolute> value, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> caches data on the first call to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Select%2A> method and holds it in memory for, at most, the amount of time that is specified by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.CacheDuration%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.CacheExpirationPolicy%2A>属性设置为<xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceCacheExpiry.Absolute>值，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>在首次调用上缓存数据<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Select%2A>方法并使其在内存中保持为最多，由指定的时间量<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.CacheDuration%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: The data might be released before the duration time, if the memory is needed.
trans-unit.target: 如果所需内存，则可能之前持续时间，发布数据。

trans-unit.source: The cache is then refreshed during the next call to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Select%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 在下一步调用然后刷新缓存<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Select%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.CacheExpirationPolicy%2A> property is set to <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceCacheExpiry.Sliding> value, the data source control caches data on the first call to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Select%2A> method, but resets the time window for which it holds the cache on each subsequent call to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Select%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.CacheExpirationPolicy%2A>属性设置为<xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceCacheExpiry.Sliding>值，数据源控件缓存上首次调用的数据<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Select%2A>方法，但将重置为其保留为每个后续调用上的缓存的时间范围<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Select%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The cache expires if there is no activity for a time that is equal to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.CacheDuration%2A> property since the last call to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Select%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 缓存过期，如果一段时间，它等于没有任何活动<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.CacheDuration%2A>自上次调用属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Select%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: This section contains two code examples.
trans-unit.target: 本部分包含两个代码示例。

trans-unit.source: The first code example demonstrates how an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> object supports caching.
trans-unit.target: 第一个代码示例演示如何<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>对象支持缓存。

trans-unit.source: The second code example demonstrates how to implement a wrapper method that returns a <xref:System.Data.DataSet> object to enable caching with an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> object.
trans-unit.target: 第二个代码示例演示如何实现可返回包装方法<xref:System.Data.DataSet>对象，以启用具有缓存<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>对象。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> control supports caching.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>控件支持缓存。

trans-unit.source: To enable caching, you must implement the method that retrieves data, which is identified by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.SelectMethod%2A> property, to return the data as a <xref:System.Data.DataSet> object.
trans-unit.target: 若要启用缓存，则必须实现方法可检索数据，这由<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.SelectMethod%2A>属性，以返回数据作为<xref:System.Data.DataSet>对象。

trans-unit.source: In this example, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.EnableCaching%2A> property is set to `true`, and the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.CacheDuration%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.CacheExpirationPolicy%2A> properties are set.
trans-unit.target: 在此示例中，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.EnableCaching%2A>属性设置为`true`，和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.CacheDuration%2A>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.CacheExpirationPolicy%2A>属性设置。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> caches data that is returned by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.SelectMethod%2A> property for 30 seconds.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>将通过返回的数据缓存<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.SelectMethod%2A>30 秒的属性。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to implement a wrapper method that returns a <xref:System.Data.DataSet> object to enable caching with an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> control.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何实现可返回包装方法<xref:System.Data.DataSet>对象，以启用具有缓存<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>控件。

trans-unit.source: In the base implementation of the `EmployeeLogic` class, the `GetAllEmployees` method returns an <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList> object.
trans-unit.target: 基实现中`EmployeeLogic`类，`GetAllEmployees`方法返回<xref:System.Collections.ArrayList>对象。

trans-unit.source: Instead of refactoring the object completely to work with the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> on a Web Forms page, a wrapper method named `GetAllEmployeesAsDataSet` is added that returns a set of `NorthwindEmployee` data as a <xref:System.Data.DataSet>.
trans-unit.target: 而不是重构对象完全处理的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>的包装器方法在 Web 窗体页中，名为`GetAllEmployeesAsDataSet`返回的一组添加`NorthwindEmployee`数据作为<xref:System.Data.DataSet>。

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of a larger example provided for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> class.
trans-unit.target: 此代码示例摘自更大的示例为提供<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>类。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the cache expiration behavior that, when combined with the duration, describes the behavior of the cache that the data source control uses.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置缓存的到期行为，该行为与持续时间组合在一起可以描述数据源控件所用缓存的行为。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.DataSourceCacheExpiry" /> values.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.DataSourceCacheExpiry" /> 值之一。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see cref="F:System.Web.UI.DataSourceCacheExpiry.Absolute" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see cref="F:System.Web.UI.DataSourceCacheExpiry.Absolute" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> control supports data caching.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>控件支持数据缓存。

trans-unit.source: While data is cached, calls to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Select%2A> method retrieve data from the cache rather than from the business object that the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> works with.
trans-unit.target: 数据被缓存，调用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Select%2A>方法检索数据从缓存而不是从业务对象<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>配合。

trans-unit.source: When the cache expires, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Select%2A> method retrieves data from the business object, and then caches the data again.
trans-unit.target: 在缓存过期，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Select%2A>方法从业务对象中，检索数据，然后再次缓存的数据。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> control automatically caches data when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.EnableCaching%2A> property is set to `true` and the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.CacheDuration%2A> property is set to a value greater than 0, which indicates the number of seconds that the cache stores data before the cache entry is discarded.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>控件将自动缓存数据时<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.EnableCaching%2A>属性设置为`true`和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.CacheDuration%2A>属性设置为一个值大于 0，指示在缓存中存储数据的缓存项之前的秒数将被丢弃。

trans-unit.source: A value of 0 indicates an infinitely long cache period.
trans-unit.target: 值为 0 指示无限期缓存期限。

trans-unit.source: The cache is regulated by a combination of the duration and the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.CacheExpirationPolicy%2A> setting.
trans-unit.target: 通过持续时间的组合调整缓存和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.CacheExpirationPolicy%2A>设置。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.CacheExpirationPolicy%2A> property is set to the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceCacheExpiry.Absolute> value, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> caches data on the first call to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Select%2A> method and holds it in memory for, at most, the amount of time that is specified by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.CacheDuration%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.CacheExpirationPolicy%2A>属性设置为<xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceCacheExpiry.Absolute>值，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>在首次调用上缓存数据<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Select%2A>方法并使其在内存中保持为最多，由指定的时间量<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.CacheDuration%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: The data might be released before the duration time, if the memory is needed.
trans-unit.target: 如果所需内存，则可能之前持续时间，发布数据。

trans-unit.source: The cache is then refreshed during the next call to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Select%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 在下一步调用然后刷新缓存<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Select%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.CacheExpirationPolicy%2A> property is set to the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceCacheExpiry.Sliding> value, the data source control caches data on the first call to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Select%2A> method, but resets the time window for which it holds the cache for each subsequent call to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Select%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.CacheExpirationPolicy%2A>属性设置为<xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceCacheExpiry.Sliding>值，数据源控件缓存上首次调用的数据<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Select%2A>方法，但将重置为其保留为每个后续调用的缓存的时间范围<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Select%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The cache expires if there is no activity for a time that is equal to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.CacheDuration%2A> property since the last call to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Select%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 缓存过期，如果一段时间，它等于没有任何活动<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.CacheDuration%2A>自上次调用属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Select%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: This section contains two code examples.
trans-unit.target: 本部分包含两个代码示例。

trans-unit.source: The first code example demonstrates how an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> object supports filtering and caching.
trans-unit.target: 第一个代码示例演示如何<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>对象支持筛选和缓存。

trans-unit.source: The second code example demonstrates how to implement a wrapper method that returns a <xref:System.Data.DataSet> object to enable caching and filtering with an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> object.
trans-unit.target: 第二个代码示例演示如何实现可返回包装方法<xref:System.Data.DataSet>对象，以允许的缓存和筛选<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>对象。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> control supports filtering and caching.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>控件支持筛选和缓存。

trans-unit.source: To enable filtering and caching, you must implement the method that retrieves data, which is identified by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.SelectMethod%2A> property, to return the data as a <xref:System.Data.DataSet> object.
trans-unit.target: 若要启用筛选和缓存，则必须实现方法可检索数据，这由<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.SelectMethod%2A>属性，以返回数据作为<xref:System.Data.DataSet>对象。

trans-unit.source: In this example, caching is enabled because the `EmployeeLogic` object returns data as a <xref:System.Data.DataSet>, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.EnableCaching%2A> property is set to `true`, and the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.CacheDuration%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.CacheExpirationPolicy%2A> properties are set.
trans-unit.target: 在此示例中，启用了缓存因为`EmployeeLogic`对象形式返回数据<xref:System.Data.DataSet>、<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.EnableCaching%2A>属性设置为`true`，和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.CacheDuration%2A>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.CacheExpirationPolicy%2A>属性设置。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> caches data that is returned by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.SelectMethod%2A> property for 30 seconds.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>将通过返回的数据缓存<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.SelectMethod%2A>30 秒的属性。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to implement a wrapper method that returns a <xref:System.Data.DataSet> object to enable caching and filtering with an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> control.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何实现可返回包装方法<xref:System.Data.DataSet>对象，以允许的缓存和筛选<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>控件。

trans-unit.source: In the base implementation of the `EmployeeLogic` class, the `GetAllEmployees` method returns an <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList>.
trans-unit.target: 基实现中`EmployeeLogic`类，`GetAllEmployees`方法返回<xref:System.Collections.ArrayList>。

trans-unit.source: Instead of refactoring the object completely to work with the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> on a Web Forms page, a wrapper method named `GetAllEmployeesAsDataSet` is added that returns a set of `NorthwindEmployee` data as a <xref:System.Data.DataSet>.
trans-unit.target: 而不是重构对象完全处理的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>的包装器方法在 Web 窗体页中，名为`GetAllEmployeesAsDataSet`返回的一组添加`NorthwindEmployee`数据作为<xref:System.Data.DataSet>。

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of a larger example provided for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> class.
trans-unit.target: 此代码示例摘自更大的示例为提供<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>类。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a user-defined key dependency that is linked to all data cache objects that are created by the data source control.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个用户定义的键依赖项，该键依赖项链接到数据源控件创建的所有数据缓存对象。

trans-unit.source: A key that identifies all cache objects created by the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource" />.
trans-unit.target: 一个键，它标识所有由 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource" /> 创建的缓存对象。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.CacheKeyDependency%2A> property can be set to any arbitrary string value.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.CacheKeyDependency%2A>属性可以设置为任何任意字符串值。

trans-unit.source: All cache objects are explicitly expired when the key is expired.
trans-unit.target: 当键到期时，所有缓存对象都显式到期。

trans-unit.source: This allows you to invalidate cache entries that are created by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> from your own page code programmatically.
trans-unit.target: 这样您就可以使创建的缓存条目失效<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>以编程方式从你自己的页代码。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> control supports data caching.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>控件支持数据缓存。

trans-unit.source: While data is cached, calls to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Select%2A> method retrieve data from the cache rather than from the business object that the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> works with.
trans-unit.target: 数据被缓存，调用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Select%2A>方法检索数据从缓存而不是从业务对象<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>配合。

trans-unit.source: When the cache expires, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Select%2A> method retrieves data from the business object, and then caches the data again.
trans-unit.target: 在缓存过期，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Select%2A>方法从业务对象中，检索数据，然后再次缓存的数据。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> control automatically caches data when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.EnableCaching%2A> property is set to `true` and the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.CacheDuration%2A> property is set to a value greater than 0, which indicates the number of seconds that the cache stores data before the cache entry is discarded.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>控件将自动缓存数据时<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.EnableCaching%2A>属性设置为`true`和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.CacheDuration%2A>属性设置为一个值大于 0，指示在缓存中存储数据的缓存项之前的秒数将被丢弃。

trans-unit.source: A value of 0 indicates an infinitely long cache.
trans-unit.target: 值为 0 指示无限期的缓存。

trans-unit.source: You can set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.CacheKeyDependency%2A> property to create a dependency between all cache entries that are created by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> control and the key.
trans-unit.target: 你可以设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.CacheKeyDependency%2A>要创建由创建的所有缓存项之间的依赖项属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>控件和密钥。

trans-unit.source: You can expire all the cache entries programmatically at any time by expiring the key.
trans-unit.target: 通过使键可以在任何时以编程方式终止所有缓存条目。

trans-unit.source: Expire the key by using the <xref:System.Web.Caching.Cache.Remove%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method with the current <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.CacheKeyDependency%2A> value as the parameter.
trans-unit.target: 通过使用过期密钥<xref:System.Web.Caching.Cache.Remove%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>与当前方法<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.CacheKeyDependency%2A>作为参数的值。

trans-unit.source: A unique cache entry is created for every combination of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.CacheDuration%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.CacheExpirationPolicy%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.TypeName%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.SelectMethod%2A>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.SelectParameters%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: 对每个组合都创建一个唯一的缓存条目<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.CacheDuration%2A>， <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.CacheExpirationPolicy%2A>， <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.TypeName%2A>， <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.SelectMethod%2A>，和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.SelectParameters%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: Multiple <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> controls can use the same cache entries in scenarios where they load data using the same type, method, and parameters.
trans-unit.target: 多个<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>控件可以使用相同的缓存条目在方案中使用相同的类型、 方法和参数的数据的加载位置。

trans-unit.source: The following three examples show a Web page, a code-behind page class, and a data-access class that retrieve records from the Employees table in the Northwind database.
trans-unit.target: 以下三个示例显示一个网页、 代码隐藏页类，并从 Northwind 数据库中的 Employees 表中检索记录的数据访问类。

trans-unit.source: The first example shows a Web page that contains two <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> controls, a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DropDownList> control, and a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control.
trans-unit.target: 第一个示例演示一个网页，包含两个<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>控件，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DropDownList>控件，和一个<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控件。

trans-unit.source: The first <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> control and the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DropDownList> control are used to retrieve and display employee names from the database.
trans-unit.target: 第一个<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>控件和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DropDownList>控件用于检索和显示从数据库的雇员姓名。

trans-unit.source: The second <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> control and the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control are used to retrieve and display the employee record that is selected by the user.
trans-unit.target: 第二个<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>控件和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控件用于检索和显示用户选定的员工记录。

trans-unit.source: Caching is enabled for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> control.
trans-unit.target: 为启用了缓存<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>控件。

trans-unit.source: Therefore, each record is retrieved only one time from the database.
trans-unit.target: 因此，每个记录将检索从数据库仅一次。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.CacheKeyDependency%2A> property is set to "EmployeeDetails", but any string value can work as the key.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.CacheKeyDependency%2A>属性设置为"EmployeeDetails"，但任何字符串值可作为键。

trans-unit.source: The Web page also includes a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button> control that the user can click to expire the cached data.
trans-unit.target: 该 Web 页面还包括<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button>用户可以单击过期的缓存的数据的控件。

trans-unit.source: The second example shows a handler for the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Load> event and a handler for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button.Click> event of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button> control.
trans-unit.target: 第二个示例显示的处理程序<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Load>事件和处理程序<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button.Click>事件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button>控件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Load> event handler creates a cache item with a key set to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.CacheKeyDependency%2A> value.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Load>事件处理程序使用密钥设置为创建缓存项<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.CacheKeyDependency%2A>值。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button.Click> event handler removes the cache item whose key is equal to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.CacheKeyDependency%2A> value.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button.Click>事件处理程序中移除其键等于的缓存项<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.CacheKeyDependency%2A>值。

trans-unit.source: When the cache item is removed, all the cached data that is dependent on the key is expired.
trans-unit.target: 删除缓存项后，依赖于密钥的所有缓存的数据已过期。

trans-unit.source: The third example shows the data access class that interacts with the Northwind database.
trans-unit.target: 在第三个示例与 Northwind 数据库交互的数据访问类。

trans-unit.source: The class uses LINQ to query the Employees table.
trans-unit.target: 类使用 LINQ 查询员工表。

trans-unit.source: The example requires a LINQ to SQL class that represents the Northwind database and the Employees table.
trans-unit.target: 该示例需要 LINQ to SQL 类，表示 Northwind 数据库和员工表。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [How to: Create LINQ to SQL Classes in a Web Project](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/20bf925f-2a6d-410d-8f65-7b5b8f555081).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[如何： 创建 LINQ to SQL 类 Web 项目中](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/20bf925f-2a6d-410d-8f65-7b5b8f555081)。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that determines whether or not just the new values are passed to the <see langword="Update" /> method or both the old and new values are passed to the <see langword="Update" /> method.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值确定是仅将新值传递给 <see langword="Update" /> 方法，还是将旧值和新值都传递给 <see langword="Update" /> 方法。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.ConflictOptions" /> values.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.ConflictOptions" /> 值之一。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see cref="F:System.Web.UI.ConflictOptions.OverwriteChanges" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see cref="F:System.Web.UI.ConflictOptions.OverwriteChanges" />。

trans-unit.source: This property determines whether parameters for old and new values are applied to the method specified by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.UpdateMethod%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 此属性确定的旧和新值的参数适用于指定的方法<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.UpdateMethod%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: For example, if the method that is specified by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.SelectMethod%2A> property returns a <xref:System.Data.DataTable> control with the columns `Name` and `Number`, and the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.ConflictDetection%2A> property is set to the <xref:System.Web.UI.ConflictOptions.OverwriteChanges> field, parameters are created for `Name` and `Number` for the `Update` method.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果该方法是指定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.SelectMethod%2A>属性返回<xref:System.Data.DataTable>与列的控件`Name`和`Number`，和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.ConflictDetection%2A>属性设置为<xref:System.Web.UI.ConflictOptions.OverwriteChanges>字段中，为创建参数`Name`和`Number`为`Update`方法。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.ConflictDetection%2A> property is set to the <xref:System.Web.UI.ConflictOptions.CompareAllValues> value, parameters are created for `Name`, `Number`, `original_Name`, and `original_Number`.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.ConflictDetection%2A>属性设置为<xref:System.Web.UI.ConflictOptions.CompareAllValues>值，参数为创建`Name`， `Number`， `original_Name`，和`original_Number`。

trans-unit.source: (The exact name of the parameters for the original values depends on the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.OldValuesParameterFormatString%2A> property.) The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> then determines whether the method that is specified in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.UpdateMethod%2A> property has parameters that match.
trans-unit.target: (取决于原始值的参数的确切名称<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.OldValuesParameterFormatString%2A>属性。)<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>然后确定方法是否在指定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.UpdateMethod%2A>属性具有匹配的参数。

trans-unit.source: Concurrency control is a technique that data stores use to control how data is read and changed in the store when multiple clients are accessing and manipulating the same data.
trans-unit.target: 并发控制是一种数据存储区使用来控制如何读取和更改存储区中，在访问和操作同一数据多个客户端数据的技术。

trans-unit.source: For example, one client reads data and presents it to a user, while another client reads the same data and presents it to a different user.
trans-unit.target: 例如，一台客户端读取数据，并将其呈现给用户，而另一个客户端读取相同的数据，并将其呈现给其他用户。

trans-unit.source: If both users update the data and submit it to the data storage, an unexpected result might occur, because both clients might provide different values for the same data.
trans-unit.target: 如果两个用户更新的数据，并将其提交至数据存储，则可能会发生了意外的结果，因为两个客户端可以为相同的数据提供不同的值。

trans-unit.source: This is considered a conflict.
trans-unit.target: 这是被视为冲突。

trans-unit.source: By setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.ConflictDetection%2A> property to the <xref:System.Web.UI.ConflictOptions.CompareAllValues> value, the `Update` method can then compare the old and new values to the original data source to detect conflicts and handle them as necessary.
trans-unit.target: 通过设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.ConflictDetection%2A>属性<xref:System.Web.UI.ConflictOptions.CompareAllValues>值，`Update`方法然后可以将比较到原始的数据源，以检测冲突，并根据需要处理它们的旧和新值。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.ConflictDetection%2A> property delegates to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.ConflictDetection%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView> object that is associated with the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.ConflictDetection%2A>属性委托给<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.ConflictDetection%2A>属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView>与关联的对象<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>控件。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter" /> values that are passed to an update, insert, or delete operation are automatically converted from <see langword="null" /> to the <see cref="F:System.DBNull.Value" /> value by the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示传递给更新、插入或删除操作的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter" /> 值是否由 <see cref="F:System.DBNull.Value" /> 控件自动从 <see langword="null" /> 转换为 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" />, if any <see langword="null" /> values in <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter" /> objects passed to the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource" /> control are automatically converted to <see cref="F:System.DBNull.Value" /> values; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果传递给 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter" /> 控件的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource" /> 对象中的任何 <see langword="true" /> 值自动转换为 <see cref="F:System.DBNull.Value" /> 值，则为 <see langword="null" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Not converting `null` to the <xref:System.DBNull.Value> value can result in errors at run time.
trans-unit.target: 不转换`null`到<xref:System.DBNull.Value>值可能会在运行时导致错误。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.ConvertNullToDBNull%2A> property to indicate whether <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter> values that are passed to an update, insert, or delete operation are automatically converted from `null` to the <xref:System.DBNull.Value> value by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> control.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.ConvertNullToDBNull%2A>属性以指示是否<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter>传递给更新、 插入或删除操作的值自动转换从`null`到<xref:System.DBNull.Value>值<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>控件。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name of a class that the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource" /> control uses for a parameter in an update, insert, or delete data operation, instead of passing individual values from the data-bound control.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置某个类的名称，<see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource" /> 控件将该类用于更新、插入或删除数据操作中的参数，而不是从数据绑定控件传递个别的值。

trans-unit.source: A partially or fully qualified class name that identifies the type of the object that the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource" /> can use as a parameter for an <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Insert" />, <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Update" />, or a <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Delete" /> operation.
trans-unit.target: 部分或完全限定类名，用于标识可由 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource" /> 用作 <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Insert" />、<see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Update" /> 或 <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Delete" /> 操作的参数的对象类型。

trans-unit.source: The default is an empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: 默认值为空字符串("")。

trans-unit.source: Instead of specifying several parameters that are passed to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Update%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Insert%2A>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Delete%2A> methods, you can create one object that aggregates several data field values.
trans-unit.target: 而不是指定多个参数传递给<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Update%2A>， <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Insert%2A>，和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Delete%2A>方法，你可以创建将多个数据字段值聚合的一个对象。

trans-unit.source: This one object is passed to the methods, instead of several parameters.
trans-unit.target: 此对象传递到方法，而不是多个参数。

trans-unit.source: The default behavior of an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> control that is bound to a data-bound control is that the data-bound control creates a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter> object for each parameter in the data source.
trans-unit.target: 默认行为<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>绑定到的数据绑定控件的控件是数据绑定控件创建<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter>数据源中的每个参数的对象。

trans-unit.source: If the business object has many fields, the resulting method also has many fields.
trans-unit.target: 如果业务对象具有多个字段，则生成的方法还具有许多字段。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.DataObjectTypeName%2A> property allows you to specify a type that has a property for each data field.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.DataObjectTypeName%2A>属性可以指定具有每个数据字段的属性的类型。

trans-unit.source: Then, instead of passing several parameters to the method, the runtime creates one object and sets all of its properties.
trans-unit.target: 然后，而不是将多个参数传递给该方法中，运行时创建一个对象，并设置其所有属性。

trans-unit.source: This one object is added to the parameters collection for the method call.
trans-unit.target: 这一个对象添加到方法调用的参数集合。

trans-unit.source: The type that is specified by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.DataObjectTypeName%2A> property must have a default constructor that has no parameters, so the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> control can create an instance of the type.
trans-unit.target: 通过指定的类型<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.DataObjectTypeName%2A>属性必须具有默认构造函数没有参数，因此<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>控制可以创建类型的实例。

trans-unit.source: The type must also have settable properties that allow the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> control to populate the object with values that are passed from the data-bound control.
trans-unit.target: 此类型还必须具有允许的可设置属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>控件使用数据绑定控件从传递的值填充该对象。

trans-unit.source: The property names on the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> control are expected to exactly match the parameter names of values that are passed by the data-bound control.
trans-unit.target: 属性名<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>控件应完全匹配的值传递的数据绑定控件的参数名称。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.DataObjectTypeName%2A> property is set and the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> control is associated with a data-bound control, the methods that are specified by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.InsertMethod%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.DeleteMethod%2A> properties must each have one parameter of the type that is specified in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.DataObjectTypeName%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 当<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.DataObjectTypeName%2A>属性设置和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>控件所关联的数据绑定控件，通过指定的方法与<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.InsertMethod%2A>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.DeleteMethod%2A>属性都必须具有一个中指定类型的参数<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.DataObjectTypeName%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.ConflictDetection%2A> property is set to the <xref:System.Web.UI.ConflictOptions.OverwriteChanges> value, the method that is specified by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.UpdateMethod%2A> property must have one parameter of the type that is specified in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.DataObjectTypeName%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.ConflictDetection%2A>属性设置为<xref:System.Web.UI.ConflictOptions.OverwriteChanges>值，指定方法<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.UpdateMethod%2A>属性必须具有一个参数中指定的类型<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.DataObjectTypeName%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.ConflictDetection%2A> property is set to the <xref:System.Web.UI.ConflictOptions.CompareAllValues> value, the method that is specified by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.UpdateMethod%2A> property must have two parameters of the type that is specified in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.DataObjectTypeName%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.ConflictDetection%2A>属性设置为<xref:System.Web.UI.ConflictOptions.CompareAllValues>值，指定方法<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.UpdateMethod%2A>属性必须具有两个参数中指定的类型<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.DataObjectTypeName%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: The first parameter contains the original values; the second parameter contains the new values.
trans-unit.target: 第一个参数包含的原始值;第二个参数包含新值。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.DataObjectTypeName%2A> property delegates to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.DataObjectTypeName%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView> that is associated with the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.DataObjectTypeName%2A>属性委托给<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.DataObjectTypeName%2A>属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView>关联<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>控件。

trans-unit.source: The section contains two code examples.
trans-unit.target: 此节包含两个代码示例。

trans-unit.source: The first code example demonstrates how to implement a type that combines all parameter values into one object, using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.DataObjectTypeName%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 第一个代码示例演示如何实现一种将所有参数值都组合成一个对象，使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.DataObjectTypeName%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: The second code example shows the Web page that uses the two classes that are used in the first code example.
trans-unit.target: 第二个代码示例演示使用在第一个代码示例中使用的两个类的网页。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to implement a type that combines all parameter values into one object, using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.DataObjectTypeName%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何实现一种将所有参数值都组合成一个对象，使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.DataObjectTypeName%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: The select method of the `AggregateData` class returns a <xref:System.Data.DataTable> object with two columns named `Name` and `Number`.
trans-unit.target: 选择付款方式`AggregateData`类返回<xref:System.Data.DataTable>对象具有两列，名为`Name`和`Number`。

trans-unit.source: Similarly, the `NewData` class defines two read/write properties, `Name` and `Number`.
trans-unit.target: 同样，`NewData`类定义两个读/写属性，`Name`和`Number`。

trans-unit.source: The `Insert` method of the `AggregateData` class takes one parameter of type `NewData`.
trans-unit.target: `Insert`方法`AggregateData`类采用一个类型的参数`NewData`。

trans-unit.source: The `TypeName` property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> is set to `AggregateData` and the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.DataObjectTypeName%2A> property is set to `NewData`.
trans-unit.target: `TypeName`属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>设置为`AggregateData`和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.DataObjectTypeName%2A>属性设置为`NewData`。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows the Web page that uses the two classes that are used in the preceding code example.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示使用在前面的代码示例中使用的两个类的网页。

trans-unit.source: Performs a delete operation by calling the method that is identified by the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.DeleteMethod" /> property with any parameters that are in the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.DeleteParameters" /> collection.
trans-unit.target: 通过用 <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.DeleteMethod" /> 集合中的所有参数调用由 <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.DeleteParameters" /> 属性标识的方法，执行删除操作。

trans-unit.source: A value that represents the number of rows deleted from the underlying data storage, if the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceStatusEventArgs.AffectedRows" /> property of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceStatusEventArgs" /> is set in the <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Deleted" /> event; otherwise, -1.
trans-unit.target: 如果在 <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceStatusEventArgs.AffectedRows" /> 事件中设置了 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceStatusEventArgs" /> 的 <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Deleted" /> 属性，则为表示从基础数据存储中删除的行数的值，否则为 -1。

trans-unit.source: Before the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Delete%2A> operation is performed, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.OnDeleting%2A> method is called to raise the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Deleting> event.
trans-unit.target: 之前<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Delete%2A>执行操作，则<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.OnDeleting%2A>调用方法来引发<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Deleting>事件。
