trans-unit.source: You can handle the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Deleting> event to examine the values of the parameters and to perform any preprocessing before a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Delete%2A> operation.
trans-unit.target: 你可以处理<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Deleting>事件，检查的参数的值并执行任何预处理之前<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Delete%2A>操作。

trans-unit.source: To perform a delete operation, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView> object uses reflection to create an instance of the object that is identified by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.TypeName%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要执行删除操作，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView>对象使用反射来创建由标识对象的实例<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.TypeName%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: It then calls the method that is identified by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.DeleteMethod%2A> property, using any associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.DeleteParameters%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: 它然后调用由标识方法<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.DeleteMethod%2A>属性，使用任何关联<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.DeleteParameters%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: If the deletion parameters come from an associated data-bound control, the name of the parameters is created according to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.OldValuesParameterFormatString%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 如果删除参数是来自关联的数据绑定控件，根据创建的参数名称<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.OldValuesParameterFormatString%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: After the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Delete%2A> operation completes, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.OnDeleted%2A> method is called to raise the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Deleted> event.
trans-unit.target: 后<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Delete%2A>操作完成，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.OnDeleted%2A>调用方法来引发<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Deleted>事件。

trans-unit.source: You can handle the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Deleted> event to examine any return values, output parameters, and exceptions, and to perform any post-processing.
trans-unit.target: 你可以处理<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Deleted>事件，以检查任何返回值、 输出参数和异常，并执行任何后续处理。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Delete%2A> method delegates to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.Delete%2A> method of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView> object that is associated with the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Delete%2A>方法会委托给<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.Delete%2A>方法<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView>与关联的对象<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>控件。

trans-unit.source: Data-Bound Controls
trans-unit.target: 数据绑定控件

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> control is associated with a data-bound control, such as the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control, it is not necessary to call the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Delete%2A> method from page code.
trans-unit.target: 当<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>与数据绑定控件，如关联控件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控件，不需要调用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Delete%2A>从页的代码的方法。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Delete%2A> method is invoked directly by the data-bound control instead.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Delete%2A>改为直接通过数据绑定控件调用方法。

trans-unit.source: For more information about parameter merging, object lifetime, and method resolution, see <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.DeleteMethod%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 有关参数合并、 对象生存期和方法解析的详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.DeleteMethod%2A>。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Delete" /> operation has completed.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Delete" /> 操作完成时发生。

trans-unit.source: Handle the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Deleted> event to examine the values of a return value or output parameters, or to determine whether an exception was thrown after a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Delete%2A> operation has completed.
trans-unit.target: 处理<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Deleted>事件检查返回值或输出参数的值，或者想要确定后是否引发了异常<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Delete%2A>操作已完成。

trans-unit.source: The return value, output parameters, and exception handling properties are available from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceStatusEventArgs> object that is associated with the event.
trans-unit.target: 返回值、 输出参数和异常处理属性就可以在<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceStatusEventArgs>与事件相关联的对象。

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceStatusEventArgs.AffectedRows%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceStatusEventArgs> object to return the number of rows that were deleted from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Delete%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 你可以使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceStatusEventArgs.AffectedRows%2A>属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceStatusEventArgs>对象以返回从已删除的行数<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Delete%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: To do this, set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceStatusEventArgs.AffectedRows%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要执行此操作，将设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceStatusEventArgs.AffectedRows%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: If you return the number of deleted rows from the method that is specified by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.DeleteMethod%2A> property, the value is available from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceStatusEventArgs.ReturnValue%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceStatusEventArgs> object.
trans-unit.target: 如果从指定的方法返回的已删除的行数<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.DeleteMethod%2A>属性，值为从可用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceStatusEventArgs.ReturnValue%2A>属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceStatusEventArgs>对象。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.source: This section contains two code examples.
trans-unit.target: 本部分包含两个代码示例。

trans-unit.source: The first code example demonstrates how to use an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> object with a business object and a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control to delete data.
trans-unit.target: 第一个代码示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>对象是否与业务对象和一个<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控件中删除数据。

trans-unit.source: The second code example shows the `EmployeeLogic` class that is used in the first code example.
trans-unit.target: 第二个代码示例所示`EmployeeLogic`第一个代码示例中使用的类。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> control with a business object and a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control to delete data.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>业务对象使用的控件和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控件中删除数据。

trans-unit.source: Initially, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control displays a set of all employees, using the method that is specified by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.SelectMethod%2A> property to retrieve the data from the `EmployeeLogic` object.
trans-unit.target: 最初，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控件将显示所有员工，使用指定的方法的一组<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.SelectMethod%2A>要检索的数据属性`EmployeeLogic`对象。

trans-unit.source: Because the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.AutoGenerateDeleteButton%2A> property is set to `true`, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control automatically displays a **Delete** button.
trans-unit.target: 因为<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.AutoGenerateDeleteButton%2A>属性设置为`true`、<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控件自动显示**删除**按钮。

trans-unit.source: If you click the **Delete** button, the delete operation is performed using the method that is specified by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.DeleteMethod%2A> property and any parameters that are specified in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.DeleteParameters%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: 如果你单击**删除**按钮，删除操作使用由指定的方法来执行<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.DeleteMethod%2A>属性和中指定任何参数<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.DeleteParameters%2A>集合。

trans-unit.source: In this code example, some preprocessing and post-processing steps are also performed.
trans-unit.target: 在此代码示例中，还执行一些步骤预处理和后续处理步骤。

trans-unit.source: The `NorthwindEmployeeDeleting` delegate is called to handle the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Deleting> event before the operation is performed and the `NorthwindEmployeeDeleted` delegate is called to handle the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Deleted> event after the operation has completed to perform exception handling.
trans-unit.target: `NorthwindEmployeeDeleting`调用委托以处理<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Deleting>事件之前执行此操作与`NorthwindEmployeeDeleted`调用委托以处理<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Deleted>后该操作已完成执行异常处理的事件。

trans-unit.source: In this code example, if a `NorthwindDataException` is thrown, it is handled by the `NorthwindEmployeeDeleted` method.
trans-unit.target: 在此代码示例中，如果`NorthwindDataException`是引发，它由处理`NorthwindEmployeeDeleted`方法。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows the `EmployeeLogic` class that is used in the preceding code example.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示`EmployeeLogic`前面的代码示例中使用的类。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name of the method or function that the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource" /> control invokes to delete data.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置由 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource" /> 控件调用以删除数据的方法或函数的名称。

trans-unit.source: A string that represents the name of the method or function that the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource" /> uses to delete data.
trans-unit.target: 一个字符串，表示 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource" /> 用于删除数据的方法或函数的名称。

trans-unit.source: The default is an empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: 默认值为空字符串("")。

trans-unit.source: The business object is assumed to delete data one record at a time, rather than in a batch.
trans-unit.target: 假定的业务对象一次，而不是批处理中删除一条数据记录。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.DeleteMethod%2A> property delegates to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.DeleteMethod%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView> object that is associated with the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.DeleteMethod%2A>属性委托给<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.DeleteMethod%2A>属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView>与关联的对象<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>控件。

trans-unit.source: Make sure that the parameter names configured for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> control in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.DeleteParameters%2A> collection match the column names that are returned by the select method.
trans-unit.target: 请确保参数名称为配置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>中控制<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.DeleteParameters%2A>集合选择的方法返回的列名称匹配。

trans-unit.source: Object Lifetime
trans-unit.target: 对象生存期

trans-unit.source: The method that is identified by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.DeleteMethod%2A> property can be an instance method or a `static` (`Shared` in Visual Basic) method.
trans-unit.target: 由标识的方法<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.DeleteMethod%2A>属性可以是实例方法或`static`(`Shared`在 Visual Basic 中) 方法。

trans-unit.source: If it is an instance method, the business object is created and destroyed each time the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.DeleteMethod%2A> property is called.
trans-unit.target: 如果它是实例方法，创建和销毁每次的业务对象<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.DeleteMethod%2A>调用属性。

trans-unit.source: You can handle the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.ObjectCreated> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.ObjectCreating> events to work with the business object before the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.DeleteMethod%2A> property is called.
trans-unit.target: 你可以处理<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.ObjectCreated>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.ObjectCreating>事件以使用在之前的业务对象<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.DeleteMethod%2A>调用属性。

trans-unit.source: You can also handle the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.ObjectDisposing> event that is raised after the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.DeleteMethod%2A> property is called.
trans-unit.target: 你还可以处理<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.ObjectDisposing>后引发的事件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.DeleteMethod%2A>调用属性。

trans-unit.source: If the business object implements the <xref:System.IDisposable> interface, the <xref:System.IDisposable.Dispose%2A> method is called before the object is destroyed.
trans-unit.target: 如果业务对象实现<xref:System.IDisposable>接口，<xref:System.IDisposable.Dispose%2A>销毁该对象前调用方法。

trans-unit.source: If the method is a `static` (`Shared` in Visual Basic) method, the business object is never created and you cannot handle the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.ObjectCreated>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.ObjectCreating>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.ObjectDisposing> events.
trans-unit.target: 如果该方法是`static`(`Shared`在 Visual Basic 中) 方法，永远不会创建业务对象，并不能处理<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.ObjectCreated>， <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.ObjectCreating>，和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.ObjectDisposing>事件。

trans-unit.source: Parameter Merging
trans-unit.target: 合并的参数

trans-unit.source: Parameters are added to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.DeleteParameters%2A> collection from three sources:
trans-unit.target: 参数添加到<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.DeleteParameters%2A>从三个源的集合：

trans-unit.source: From the data-bound control, at run time.
trans-unit.target: 从数据绑定控件，在运行时。

trans-unit.source: From the `DeleteParameters` element, declaratively.
trans-unit.target: 从`DeleteParameters`元素，以声明方式。

trans-unit.source: From the `Deleting` method, declaratively.
trans-unit.target: 从`Deleting`方法，以声明方式。

trans-unit.source: First, any parameters that are generated from data-bound controls are added to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.DeleteParameters%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: 首先，将通过数据绑定控件生成的任何参数添加到<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.DeleteParameters%2A>集合。

trans-unit.source: For example, if the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> control is bound to a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control that has the columns `Name` and `Number`, parameters for `Name` and `Number` are added to the collection.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>控件绑定到<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>具有列控件`Name`和`Number`，参数`Name`和`Number`添加到集合。

trans-unit.source: The exact name of the parameter depends on the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.OldValuesParameterFormatString%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 取决于参数的确切名称<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.OldValuesParameterFormatString%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: The data type of these parameters is `string`.
trans-unit.target: 这些参数的数据类型是`string`。

trans-unit.source: Next, the parameters that are listed in the `DeleteParameters` element are added.
trans-unit.target: 下一步、 中列出的参数`DeleteParameters`添加元素。

trans-unit.source: If a parameter in the `DeleteParameters` element is found with the same name as a parameter that is already in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.DeleteParameters%2A> collection, the existing parameter is modified to match the parameter that is specified in the `DeleteParameters` element.
trans-unit.target: 如果中的参数`DeleteParameters`元素找到具有相同名称作为参数中已被<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.DeleteParameters%2A>修改集合，现有的参数以匹配中指定的参数`DeleteParameters`元素。

trans-unit.source: Typically, this is used to modify the type of the data in the parameter.
trans-unit.target: 通常，这用于修改在参数中的数据的类型。

trans-unit.source: Finally, you can programmatically add and remove parameters in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Deleting> event, which occurs before the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Delete%2A> method is run.
trans-unit.target: 最后，你可以以编程方式添加和删除中的参数<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Deleting>事件，发生之前<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Delete%2A>运行方法。

trans-unit.source: The method is resolved after the parameters are merged.
trans-unit.target: 对参数进行合并后，该方法将得到解决。

trans-unit.source: Method resolution is discussed in the next section.
trans-unit.target: 在下一部分中讨论方法解析。

trans-unit.source: Method Resolution
trans-unit.target: 方法解析

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Delete%2A> method is called, the data fields from the data-bound control, the parameters that were created declaratively in the `DeleteParameters` element, and the parameters that were added in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Deleting> event handler are all merged.
trans-unit.target: 当<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Delete%2A>调用方法时，从该数据绑定控件中以声明方式创建的参数的数据字段`DeleteParameters`元素和参数中的新增<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Deleting>所有合并事件处理程序。

trans-unit.source: (For more information, see the preceding section.) The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> object then attempts to find a method to call.
trans-unit.target: （有关详细信息，请参阅上一节）。<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>对象会尝试查找要调用的方法。

trans-unit.source: First, it looks for one or more methods with the name that is specified in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.DeleteMethod%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 首先，它查找一个或多个方法中指定的名称与<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.DeleteMethod%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: If no match is found, an <xref:System.InvalidOperationException> exception is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 如果不找到任何匹配项，则<xref:System.InvalidOperationException>引发异常。

trans-unit.source: If a match is found, it then looks for matching parameter names.
trans-unit.target: 如果找到匹配项，则会查找匹配的参数名。

trans-unit.source: For example, suppose the type that is specified by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.TypeName%2A> property has two methods named `DeleteARecord`.
trans-unit.target: 例如，假设由指定的类型<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.TypeName%2A>属性有两个方法名为`DeleteARecord`。

trans-unit.source: One `DeleteARecord` has one parameter, `ID`, and the other `DeleteARecord` has two parameters, `Name` and `Number`.
trans-unit.target: 一个`DeleteARecord`具有一个参数、 `ID`，以及其他`DeleteARecord`具有两个参数，`Name`和`Number`。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.DeleteParameters%2A> collection has only one parameter named `ID`, the `DeleteARecord` method with just the `ID` parameter is called.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.DeleteParameters%2A>集合仅有一个参数名为`ID`、`DeleteARecord`方法只需`ID`调用参数。

trans-unit.source: The type of the parameter is not checked in resolving the methods.
trans-unit.target: 参数的类型未签入解决方法。

trans-unit.source: The order of the parameters does not matter.
trans-unit.target: 参数的顺序并不重要。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.DataObjectTypeName%2A> property is set, the method is resolved in a different way.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.DataObjectTypeName%2A>设置属性，以不同的方式解析方法。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> looks for a method with the name that is specified in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.DeleteMethod%2A> property that takes one parameter of the type that is specified in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.DataObjectTypeName%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>具有中指定的名称的方法中寻找<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.DeleteMethod%2A>属性，它采用一个类型的参数中指定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.DataObjectTypeName%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: In this case, the name of the parameter does not matter.
trans-unit.target: 在这种情况下，参数的名称并不重要。

trans-unit.source: This section contains two code examples.
trans-unit.target: 本部分包含两个代码示例。

trans-unit.source: The first code example demonstrates how to use an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> object with a business object and a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control to delete data.
trans-unit.target: 第一个代码示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>对象是否与业务对象和一个<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控件中删除数据。

trans-unit.source: The second code example shows the `EmployeeLogic` class that is used in the first code example.
trans-unit.target: 第二个代码示例所示`EmployeeLogic`第一个代码示例中使用的类。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> control with a business object and a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control to delete data.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>业务对象使用的控件和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控件中删除数据。

trans-unit.source: Initially, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control displays a set of all employees, using the method that is specified by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.SelectMethod%2A> property to retrieve the data from the `EmployeeLogic` object.
trans-unit.target: 最初，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控件将显示所有员工，使用指定的方法的一组<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.SelectMethod%2A>要检索的数据属性`EmployeeLogic`对象。

trans-unit.source: Because the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.AutoGenerateDeleteButton%2A> property is set to `true`, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control automatically displays a **Delete** button.
trans-unit.target: 因为<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.AutoGenerateDeleteButton%2A>属性设置为`true`、<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控件自动显示**删除**按钮。

trans-unit.source: If you click the **Delete** button, the delete operation is performed using the method that is specified by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.DeleteMethod%2A> property and any parameters that are specified in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.DeleteParameters%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: 如果你单击**删除**按钮，删除操作使用由指定的方法来执行<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.DeleteMethod%2A>属性和中指定任何参数<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.DeleteParameters%2A>集合。

trans-unit.source: In this code example, some preprocessing and post-processing steps are also performed.
trans-unit.target: 在此代码示例中，还执行一些步骤预处理和后续处理步骤。

trans-unit.source: The `NorthwindEmployeeDeleting` delegate is called to handle the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Deleting> event before the operation is performed, and the `NorthwindEmployeeDeleted` delegate is called to handle the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Deleted> event after the operation has completed to perform exception handling.
trans-unit.target: `NorthwindEmployeeDeleting`调用委托以处理<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Deleting>事件之前，执行该操作与`NorthwindEmployeeDeleted`调用委托以处理<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Deleted>后该操作已完成执行异常处理的事件。

trans-unit.source: In this example, if a `NorthwindDataException` is thrown, it is handled by the `NorthwindDataException` delegate.
trans-unit.target: 在此示例中，如果`NorthwindDataException`是引发，它由处理`NorthwindDataException`委托。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows the `EmployeeLogic` class that is used in the preceding code example.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示`EmployeeLogic`前面的代码示例中使用的类。

trans-unit.source: Gets the parameters collection that contains the parameters that are used by the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.DeleteMethod" /> method.
trans-unit.target: 获取参数集合，该集合包含由 <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.DeleteMethod" /> 方法使用的参数。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ParameterCollection" /> that contains the parameters used by the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.DeleteMethod" /> method.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ParameterCollection" />，包含由 <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.DeleteMethod" /> 方法使用的参数。

trans-unit.source: The names and types of the parameters that are contained in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.DeleteParameters%2A> collection must match the names and types of the parameters in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.DeleteMethod%2A> method signature.
trans-unit.target: 名称和中包含的参数类型<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.DeleteParameters%2A>集合的名称和中的参数的类型必须匹配<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.DeleteMethod%2A>方法签名。

trans-unit.source: The parameter names are affected by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.OldValuesParameterFormatString%2A> property and are case-sensitive.
trans-unit.target: 参数名称受到<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.OldValuesParameterFormatString%2A>属性和区分大小写。

trans-unit.source: The parameters in the collection depend on the data that is in the data-bound control, the parameters that are specified declaratively, and the parameters that are added programmatically.
trans-unit.target: 集合中的参数取决于控件中的数据绑定，以声明方式，指定的参数和以编程方式添加的参数的数据。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see "Parameter Merging" in <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Delete%2A> and [Using Parameters with the ObjectDataSource Control](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/45fb67ee-9be7-49b7-9421-e242203dafa4).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅"参数合并"<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Delete%2A>和[ObjectDataSource 控件与使用参数](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/45fb67ee-9be7-49b7-9421-e242203dafa4)。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.DeleteParameters%2A> property retrieves the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.DeleteParameters%2A> property that is contained by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView> object that is associated with the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.DeleteParameters%2A>属性检索<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.DeleteParameters%2A>所包含的属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView>与关联的对象<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>控件。

trans-unit.source: For more information about parameter merging, object lifetime, and method resolution, see <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.DeleteMethod%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 有关参数合并、 对象生存期和方法解析的详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.DeleteMethod%2A>。

trans-unit.source: This section contains two code examples.
trans-unit.target: 本部分包含两个代码示例。

trans-unit.source: The first code example demonstrates how to use an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> object with a business object and a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control to delete data.
trans-unit.target: 第一个代码示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>对象是否与业务对象和一个<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控件中删除数据。

trans-unit.source: The second code example shows the `EmployeeLogic` class that is used in the first code example.
trans-unit.target: 第二个代码示例所示`EmployeeLogic`第一个代码示例中使用的类。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.DeleteParameters%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> control with a business object and a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control to delete data.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.DeleteParameters%2A>属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>业务对象使用的控件和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控件中删除数据。

trans-unit.source: Initially, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control displays a set of all employees, using the method that is specified by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.SelectMethod%2A> property to retrieve the data from the `EmployeeLogic` object.
trans-unit.target: 最初，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控件将显示所有员工，使用指定的方法的一组<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.SelectMethod%2A>要检索的数据属性`EmployeeLogic`对象。

trans-unit.source: Because the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.AutoGenerateDeleteButton%2A> property is set to `true`, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control automatically displays a **Delete** button.
trans-unit.target: 因为<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.AutoGenerateDeleteButton%2A>属性设置为`true`、<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控件自动显示**删除**按钮。

trans-unit.source: If you click the **Delete** button, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Deleting> event is called with two parameters.
trans-unit.target: 如果你单击**删除**按钮，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Deleting>事件时调用含有两个参数。

trans-unit.source: One parameter, `EmpID`, comes from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> control, and is based on the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.DataKeyNames%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 一个参数， `EmpID`，来自<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>控制，并基于<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.DataKeyNames%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: The other parameter comes from the declarative <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.DeleteParameters%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 其他参数来自声明性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.DeleteParameters%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: The `EmployeeLogic` class overloads the `DeleteEmployee` method.
trans-unit.target: `EmployeeLogic`类重载`DeleteEmployee`方法。

trans-unit.source: One overload takes a `NorthwindEmployee` parameter, and the other takes an <xref:System.Int32> parameter named `anID`.
trans-unit.target: 一个重载采用`NorthwindEmployee`参数，而另一种采用<xref:System.Int32>参数名为`anID`。

trans-unit.source: In the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Deleting> event, the entries in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceMethodEventArgs.InputParameters%2A> property are adjusted to include only one parameter named `anID` with the value from `original_EmpID`.
trans-unit.target: 在<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Deleting>事件、 中的条目<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceMethodEventArgs.InputParameters%2A>属性会进行调整，以包括名为仅一个参数`anID`与来自值`original_EmpID`。

trans-unit.source: When the event handler exists, the matching `DeleteEmployee` method is called.
trans-unit.target: 当事件处理程序存在，匹配`DeleteEmployee`调用方法。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows the Web page that displays the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> control and handles the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Deleting> event.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示显示的网页<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>控件和句柄<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Deleting>事件。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows the `EmployeeLogic` class that is used in the preceding code example.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示`EmployeeLogic`前面的代码示例中使用的类。

trans-unit.source: Occurs before a <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Delete" /> operation.
trans-unit.target: 在 <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Delete" /> 操作前发生。

trans-unit.source: Handle the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Deleting> event to perform additional initialization that is specific to your application, to validate the values of parameters, or to change the parameter values before the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> control performs the delete operation.
trans-unit.target: 处理<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Deleting>事件以执行特定于应用程序，若要验证的值的参数，或更改之前的参数值的附加初始化<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>控件将执行删除操作。

trans-unit.source: The parameters are available as an <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary> collection that is accessed by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceMethodEventArgs.InputParameters%2A> property, which is exposed by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceMethodEventArgs> object.
trans-unit.target: 参数都可用作<xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>集合所访问的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceMethodEventArgs.InputParameters%2A>属性，公开的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceMethodEventArgs>对象。

trans-unit.source: You can cancel the delete operation by setting the <xref:Microsoft.Win32.SessionEndingEventArgs.Cancel%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceMethodEventArgs> to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 你可以通过设置取消删除操作<xref:Microsoft.Win32.SessionEndingEventArgs.Cancel%2A>属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceMethodEventArgs>到`true`。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.source: This section contains two code examples.
trans-unit.target: 本部分包含两个代码示例。

trans-unit.source: The first code example demonstrates how to use an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> object with a business object and a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control to delete data.
trans-unit.target: 第一个代码示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>对象是否与业务对象和一个<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控件中删除数据。

trans-unit.source: The second code example shows the `EmployeeLogic` class that is used in the first code example.
trans-unit.target: 第二个代码示例所示`EmployeeLogic`第一个代码示例中使用的类。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> control with a business object and a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control to delete data.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>业务对象使用的控件和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控件中删除数据。

trans-unit.source: Initially, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control displays a set of all employees, using the method that is specified by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.SelectMethod%2A> property to retrieve the data from the `EmployeeLogic` object.
trans-unit.target: 最初，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控件将显示所有员工，使用指定的方法的一组<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.SelectMethod%2A>要检索的数据属性`EmployeeLogic`对象。

trans-unit.source: Because the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.AutoGenerateDeleteButton%2A> property is set to `true`, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control automatically displays a **Delete** button.
trans-unit.target: 因为<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.AutoGenerateDeleteButton%2A>属性设置为`true`、<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控件自动显示**删除**按钮。

trans-unit.source: If you click the **Delete** button, the delete operation is performed using the method that is specified by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.DeleteMethod%2A> property and any parameters that are specified in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.DeleteParameters%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: 如果你单击**删除**按钮，删除操作使用由指定的方法来执行<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.DeleteMethod%2A>属性和中指定任何参数<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.DeleteParameters%2A>集合。

trans-unit.source: In this code example, some preprocessing and post-processing steps are also performed.
trans-unit.target: 在此代码示例中，还执行一些步骤预处理和后续处理步骤。

trans-unit.source: The `NorthwindEmployeeDeleting` delegate is called to handle the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Deleting> event before the operation is performed, and the `NorthwindEmployeeDeleted` delegate is called to handle the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Deleted> event after the operation has completed to perform exception handling.
trans-unit.target: `NorthwindEmployeeDeleting`调用委托以处理<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Deleting>事件之前，执行该操作与`NorthwindEmployeeDeleted`调用委托以处理<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Deleted>后该操作已完成执行异常处理的事件。

trans-unit.source: In this code example, if a `NorthwindDataException` is thrown, it is handled by the `NorthwindEmployeeDeleted` method.
trans-unit.target: 在此代码示例中，如果`NorthwindDataException`是引发，它由处理`NorthwindEmployeeDeleted`方法。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows the `EmployeeLogic` class that is used in the preceding code example.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示`EmployeeLogic`前面的代码示例中使用的类。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource" /> control has data caching enabled.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource" /> 控件是否启用数据缓存。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if data caching is enabled for the data source control; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果为数据源控件启用数据缓存，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> control supports data caching.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>控件支持数据缓存。

trans-unit.source: While data is cached, calls to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Select%2A> method retrieve data from the cache rather than the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> creating an instance of the business object and calling its data method.
trans-unit.target: 数据被缓存，调用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Select%2A>方法从缓存中检索数据而不是<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>创建业务对象的实例，然后调用其数据的方法。

trans-unit.source: When the cache expires, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Select%2A> method retrieves data from the business object, and then caches the data again.
trans-unit.target: 在缓存过期，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Select%2A>方法从业务对象中，检索数据，然后再次缓存的数据。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> control automatically caches data when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.EnableCaching%2A> property is set to `true` and the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.CacheDuration%2A> property is set to a value greater than 0, which indicates the number of seconds that the cache stores data before the cache entry is discarded.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>控件将自动缓存数据时<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.EnableCaching%2A>属性设置为`true`和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.CacheDuration%2A>属性设置为一个值大于 0，指示在缓存中存储数据的缓存项之前的秒数将被丢弃。

trans-unit.source: A value of 0 indicates an infinitely long cache.
trans-unit.target: 值为 0 指示无限期的缓存。

trans-unit.source: The following three examples show a Web page, a code-behind page class, and a data-access class that retrieve records from the Employees table in the Northwind database.
trans-unit.target: 以下三个示例显示一个网页、 代码隐藏页类，并从 Northwind 数据库中的 Employees 表中检索记录的数据访问类。

trans-unit.source: The first example shows a Web page that contains two <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> controls, a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DropDownList> control, and a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control.
trans-unit.target: 第一个示例演示一个网页，包含两个<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>控件，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DropDownList>控件，和一个<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控件。

trans-unit.source: The first <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> control and the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DropDownList> control are used to retrieve and display employee names from the database.
trans-unit.target: 第一个<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>控件和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DropDownList>控件用于检索和显示从数据库的雇员姓名。

trans-unit.source: The second <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> control and the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control are used to retrieve and display the employee record that is selected by the user.
trans-unit.target: 第二个<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>控件和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控件用于检索和显示用户选定的员工记录。

trans-unit.source: Caching is enabled for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> control.
trans-unit.target: 为启用了缓存<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>控件。

trans-unit.source: Therefore, each record is retrieved only one time from the database.
trans-unit.target: 因此，每个记录将检索从数据库仅一次。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.CacheKeyDependency%2A> property is set to "EmployeeDetails", but any string value can work as the key.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.CacheKeyDependency%2A>属性设置为"EmployeeDetails"，但任何字符串值可作为键。

trans-unit.source: The Web page also includes a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button> control that the user can click to expire the cached data.
trans-unit.target: 该 Web 页面还包括<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button>用户可以单击过期的缓存的数据的控件。

trans-unit.source: The second example shows a handler for the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Load> event and a handler for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button.Click> event of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button> control.
trans-unit.target: 第二个示例显示的处理程序<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Load>事件和处理程序<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button.Click>事件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button>控件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Load> event handler creates a cache item with a key set to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.CacheKeyDependency%2A> value.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Load>事件处理程序使用密钥设置为创建缓存项<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.CacheKeyDependency%2A>值。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button.Click> event handler removes the cache item whose key is equal to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.CacheKeyDependency%2A> value.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button.Click>事件处理程序中移除其键等于的缓存项<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.CacheKeyDependency%2A>值。

trans-unit.source: When the cache item is removed, all the cached data that is dependent on the key is expired.
trans-unit.target: 删除缓存项后，依赖于密钥的所有缓存的数据已过期。

trans-unit.source: The third example shows the data access class that interacts with the Northwind database.
trans-unit.target: 在第三个示例与 Northwind 数据库交互的数据访问类。

trans-unit.source: The class uses LINQ to query the Employees table.
trans-unit.target: 类使用 LINQ 查询员工表。

trans-unit.source: The example requires a LINQ to SQL class that represents the Northwind database and the Employees table.
trans-unit.target: 该示例需要 LINQ to SQL 类，表示 Northwind 数据库和员工表。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [How to: Create LINQ to SQL Classes in a Web Project](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/20bf925f-2a6d-410d-8f65-7b5b8f555081).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[如何： 创建 LINQ to SQL 类 Web 项目中](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/20bf925f-2a6d-410d-8f65-7b5b8f555081)。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.EnableCaching" /> property is set to <see langword="true" /> when the method specified by the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.SelectMethod" /> property returns a <see cref="T:System.Data.Common.DbDataReader" />.
trans-unit.target: 当由 <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.EnableCaching" /> 属性指定的方法返回 <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.SelectMethod" /> 时，会将 <see cref="T:System.Data.Common.DbDataReader" /> 属性设置为 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the data source control supports paging through the set of data that it retrieves.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示数据源控件是否支持对它检索的数据集进行分页。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the data source control supports paging through the data it retrieves; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果数据源控件通过它检索的数据支持分页，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Paging by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> control is handled by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.EnablePaging%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.StartRowIndexParameterName%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.MaximumRowsParameterName%2A>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.SelectCountMethod%2A> properties of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> and defining a select method in the business object with the proper parameters.
trans-unit.target: 通过分页<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>控件处理通过设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.EnablePaging%2A>， <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.StartRowIndexParameterName%2A>， <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.MaximumRowsParameterName%2A>，和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.SelectCountMethod%2A>属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>和在使用正确的参数的业务对象中定义的选择方法。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.EnablePaging%2A> property is set to `true`, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.SelectParameters%2A> collection includes two additional parameters for the first row that is requested and the number of rows that are requested.
trans-unit.target: 当<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.EnablePaging%2A>属性设置为`true`、<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.SelectParameters%2A>集合包括请求的第一行和请求的行数的两个其他参数。

trans-unit.source: These two parameters are named as defined by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.StartRowIndexParameterName%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.MaximumRowsParameterName%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: 这两个参数的名称由定义<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.StartRowIndexParameterName%2A>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.MaximumRowsParameterName%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: The `Select` method should return the requested number of rows, starting at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: `Select`方法应返回请求的指定索引处开始的行数。

trans-unit.source: Because the data might not divide evenly by the page size, the last page might contain fewer rows.
trans-unit.target: 因为按页大小，数据可能不均匀划分，最后一页可能包含更少的行。

trans-unit.source: Thus, the number of rows that are requested is actually the maximum number of rows that are returned.
trans-unit.target: 因此，请求的行数是实际返回的行最大数量。

trans-unit.source: When paging is enabled on the associated data-bound control, the data-bound control calls the `Select` method with the start index and number of rows that are required.
trans-unit.target: 如果在关联的数据绑定控件上启用了分页，数据绑定控件调用`Select`方法的起始索引和所需的行数。

trans-unit.source: Additionally, if the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.SelectCountMethod%2A> property is set, the data-bound control calls the method before rendering the pager controls.
trans-unit.target: 此外，如果<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.SelectCountMethod%2A>属性设置，数据绑定控件在呈现的页导航控件之前调用的方法。

trans-unit.source: For example, if a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control has paging enabled with a page size of 5, and the method that is specified by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.SelectCountMethod%2A> property returns 20, only 4 pages are displayed in the pager.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控件的页大小为 5 和由指定的方法与启用了分页<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.SelectCountMethod%2A>属性返回 20，仅 4 页将寻呼程序中显示。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.EnablePaging%2A> property delegates to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.EnablePaging%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView> object.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.EnablePaging%2A>属性委托给<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.EnablePaging%2A>属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView>对象。

trans-unit.source: The following three examples show a Web page, a code-behind page class, and a data-access class that enable the user to pick how many records are displayed in the page.
trans-unit.target: 以下三个示例显示一个网页、 代码隐藏页类，并使用户能够选择多少条记录显示在页中的数据访问类。

trans-unit.source: The Web page contains an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> control whose <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.EnablePaging%2A> property is set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 网页包含<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>控制其<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.EnablePaging%2A>属性设置为`true`。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.SelectCountMethod%2A> property is set to the name of a method that returns the total number of records in the query.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.SelectCountMethod%2A>属性设置为在查询中返回的记录总数的方法的名称。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.MaximumRowsParameterName%2A> property and the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.StartRowIndexParameterName%2A> property are set to the names of the parameters that are used in the Select method.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.MaximumRowsParameterName%2A>属性和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.StartRowIndexParameterName%2A>属性设置为选择的方法中使用的参数的名称。

trans-unit.source: The page also contains a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DropDownList> control.
trans-unit.target: 此页还包含<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DropDownList>控件。

trans-unit.source: The second example shows a handler for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.SelectedIndexChanged?displayProperty=nameWithType> event of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DropDownList> control.
trans-unit.target: 第二个示例显示的处理程序<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.SelectedIndexChanged?displayProperty=nameWithType>事件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DropDownList>控件。

trans-unit.source: The code in the handler sets the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.PageSize%2A> property to the user's selection.
trans-unit.target: 中的处理程序集的代码<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.PageSize%2A>于用户的所选内容的属性。

trans-unit.source: The third example shows the data access class that retrieves data from the Customers table.
trans-unit.target: 在第三个示例从 Customers 表中检索数据的数据访问类。

trans-unit.source: It includes a method named `GetSubsetOfEmployees`, which is assigned to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.SelectMethod%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> control.
trans-unit.target: 它包括一个名为方法`GetSubsetOfEmployees`，分配给<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.SelectMethod%2A>属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>控件。

trans-unit.source: The example also includes a method named `GetEmployeeCount`, which is assigned to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.SelectCountMethod%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> control.
trans-unit.target: 该示例还包括一个名为方法`GetEmployeeCount`，分配给<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.SelectCountMethod%2A>属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>控件。

trans-unit.source: The class uses LINQ to query the Customers table.
trans-unit.target: 类使用 LINQ 查询客户表。

trans-unit.source: The example requires a LINQ to SQL class that represents the Northwind database and Customers table.
trans-unit.target: 该示例需要 LINQ to SQL 类，表示 Northwind 数据库和 Customers 表。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [How to: Create LINQ to SQL Classes in a Web Project](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/20bf925f-2a6d-410d-8f65-7b5b8f555081).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[如何： 创建 LINQ to SQL 类 Web 项目中](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/20bf925f-2a6d-410d-8f65-7b5b8f555081)。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a filtering expression that is applied when the method that is specified by the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.SelectMethod" /> property is called.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置当调用由 <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.SelectMethod" /> 属性指定的方法时应用的筛选表达式。

trans-unit.source: A string that represents a filtering expression that is applied when data is retrieved by using the method or function identified by the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.SelectMethod" /> property.
trans-unit.target: 一个字符串，表示在使用由 <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.SelectMethod" /> 属性标识的方法或函数检索数据时应用的筛选表达式。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> control supports filtering data only when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Select%2A> method returns a <xref:System.Data.DataSet> or <xref:System.Data.DataTable> object.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>控件支持筛选数据时，才<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Select%2A>方法返回<xref:System.Data.DataSet>或<xref:System.Data.DataTable>对象。

trans-unit.source: The syntax that is used for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.FilterExpression%2A> property is a format string–style expression.
trans-unit.target: 适用于的语法<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.FilterExpression%2A>属性是一个格式字符串样式表达式。

trans-unit.source: The filter expression syntax is the same syntax that is accepted by the <xref:System.Data.DataColumn.Expression%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 筛选器表达式语法是相同的语法通过接受<xref:System.Data.DataColumn.Expression%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: If you add parameters to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.FilterParameters%2A> collection, you can also include format string placeholders.
trans-unit.target: 如果你将参数添加到<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.FilterParameters%2A>集合，您还可以包含格式字符串占位符。

trans-unit.source: For example, include `"{0}"` in the expression to substitute for parameter values.
trans-unit.target: 例如，包括`"{0}"`中要替换参数值的表达式。

trans-unit.source: The placeholders are replaced according to the index of the parameter in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.FilterParameters%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: 根据中的参数的索引替换占位符<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.FilterParameters%2A>集合。

trans-unit.source: You can include parameters in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.FilterExpression%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 你可以包含在参数<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.FilterExpression%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: If the type of the parameter is a string or character type, enclose the parameter in single quotation marks.
trans-unit.target: 如果参数的类型是字符串或字符类型，将参数括在单引号中。

trans-unit.source: Quotation marks are not required if the parameter is a numeric type.
trans-unit.target: 如果参数是数值类型，则不需要引号引起来。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.FilterParameters%2A> collection contains the parameters that are evaluated for the placeholders that are found in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.FilterExpression%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.FilterParameters%2A>集合包含的参数，其计算结果中找到的占位符<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.FilterExpression%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.FilterExpression%2A> property delegates to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.FilterExpression%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView> object that is associated with the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.FilterExpression%2A>属性委托给<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.FilterExpression%2A>属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView>与关联的对象<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>控件。

trans-unit.source: You should validate any filter parameter value that you receive from the client.
trans-unit.target: 你应验证从客户端接收任何筛选器参数值。

trans-unit.source: The runtime simply substitutes the parameter value into the filter expression and applies it to the <xref:System.Data.DataSet> or <xref:System.Data.DataTable> object that is returned by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Select%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 运行时只需将参数值替换到筛选器表达式，并将其应用于<xref:System.Data.DataSet>或<xref:System.Data.DataTable>返回的对象<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Select%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: If you are using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.FilterExpression%2A> property as a security measure to limit the number of items that are returned, you must validate the parameter values before the filtering occurs.
trans-unit.target: 如果你使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.FilterExpression%2A>属性作为一种安全措施来限制返回，你必须筛选发生之前验证参数值的项的数目。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to display filtered data using an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> control to retrieve data from a middle-tier business object and a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control to display the results.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何显示使用的筛选的数据<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>控件从中间层业务对象检索数据和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控件来显示结果。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> control can filter data only when the method that retrieves the data retrieves it as a <xref:System.Data.DataSet> or <xref:System.Data.DataTable> object.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>控件可以筛选数据，仅当检索数据的方法检索其作为<xref:System.Data.DataSet>或<xref:System.Data.DataTable>对象。

trans-unit.source: For this reason, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.SelectMethod%2A> property identifies a business object method that retrieves data as a <xref:System.Data.DataSet>.
trans-unit.target: 为此，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.SelectMethod%2A>属性标识的业务对象方法，将数据检索为<xref:System.Data.DataSet>。

trans-unit.source: The code example consists of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBox> control, a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> control, and a **Submit** button.
trans-unit.target: 该代码示例包含的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBox>控件，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控件，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>控件，和一个**提交**按钮。

trans-unit.source: By default, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBox> is populated with the name of one of the Northwind Traders employees.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBox>之一的 Northwind Traders 员工名称填充。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> displays information about the employee that is identified by the name in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBox>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>显示有关由中的名称标识该员工的信息<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBox>。

trans-unit.source: To retrieve data on another employee, enter the full name of the employee in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBox>, and then click the **Submit** button.
trans-unit.target: 若要检索有关其他雇员的数据，请输入中的员工的完整名称<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBox>，然后单击**提交**按钮。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.FilterExpression%2A> property specifies an expression that is used to filter the data that is retrieved by the method that is specified by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.SelectMethod%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.FilterExpression%2A>属性指定一个表达式，用于筛选由指定的方法检索的数据<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.SelectMethod%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: It uses parameter placeholders that are evaluated to the parameters that are contained in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.FilterParameters%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: 它使用其计算结果等于中包含的参数的参数占位符<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.FilterParameters%2A>集合。

trans-unit.source: In this example, the parameter placeholder is bounded by single quotation marks because the type of the parameter is a string type that might contain spaces.
trans-unit.target: 在此示例中，参数占位符受单引号因为参数的类型是一个可能包含空格的字符串类型。

trans-unit.source: If the type of the parameter is a numeric or date type, bounding quotation marks are not required.
trans-unit.target: 如果参数的类型为数值或日期类型，则不需要引号。

trans-unit.source: This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat.
trans-unit.target: 此示例具有一个接受用户输入的文本框，这是一个潜在的安全威胁。

trans-unit.source: By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入是否不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example provides an example of a middle-tier business object that the preceding code example uses.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例提供前面的代码示例使用中间层业务对象的一个示例。

trans-unit.source: The code example consists of two basic classes:
trans-unit.target: 此代码示例由两个基本类组成：

trans-unit.source: The `EmployeeLogic` class, which is a class that encapsulates business logic.
trans-unit.target: `EmployeeLogic`类，它是封装业务逻辑的类。

trans-unit.source: The `NorthwindEmployee` class, which is a model class that contains only the basic functionality that is required to load and persist data from the data tier.
trans-unit.target: `NorthwindEmployee`类，它是仅包含的基本功能所需进行加载和保持数据层中的数据的模型类。

trans-unit.source: For simplicity, the `EmployeeLogic` class creates a static set of data, rather than retrieving the data from a data tier.
trans-unit.target: 为简单起见，`EmployeeLogic`类创建一组静态的数据，而不是从数据层检索数据。

trans-unit.source: It is also helpful for this example, because the sample relies on you to provide the full name of a Northwind Traders employee to demonstrate filtering.
trans-unit.target: 也很有帮助的此示例中，因为示例依赖于你提供的 Northwind Traders 员工演示筛选的完整名称。

trans-unit.source: For a complete working example, you must compile and use these classes with the Web Forms code examples that are provided.
trans-unit.target: 有关完整的工作示例，必须编译，并使用提供的 Web 窗体代码示例使用这些类。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.FilterExpression" /> property was set and the <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Select" /> method does not return a <see cref="T:System.Data.DataSet" /> or <see cref="T:System.Data.DataTable" />.
trans-unit.target: 设置了 <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.FilterExpression" /> 属性，但 <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Select" /> 方法没有返回 <see cref="T:System.Data.DataSet" /> 或 <see cref="T:System.Data.DataTable" />。

trans-unit.source: Occurs before a filter operation.
trans-unit.target: 执行筛选操作前发生。

trans-unit.source: Handle the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Filtering> event to perform validation operations on filter parameter values before the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> control performs a filter operation.
trans-unit.target: 处理<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Filtering>事件来验证对值执行操作筛选器参数之前<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>控件将执行筛选器操作。

trans-unit.source: You can cancel the selected operation by setting the <xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceFilteringEventArgs> to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 你可以通过设置取消所选的操作<xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A>属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceFilteringEventArgs>到`true`。

trans-unit.source: The event is raised only if the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.FilterExpression%2A> property is set.
trans-unit.target: 仅当引发该事件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.FilterExpression%2A>属性设置。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Filtering?displayProperty=nameWithType> event delegates to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.Filtering?displayProperty=nameWithType> event of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView> that is associated with the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Filtering?displayProperty=nameWithType>事件委托给<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.Filtering?displayProperty=nameWithType>事件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView>关联<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>控件。

trans-unit.source: You should validate any filter parameter value that you receive from the client.
trans-unit.target: 你应验证从客户端接收任何筛选器参数值。

trans-unit.source: The runtime simply substitutes the parameter value into the filter expression and applies it to the <xref:System.Data.DataSet> or <xref:System.Data.DataTable> object that is returned by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Select%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 运行时只需将参数值替换到筛选器表达式，并将其应用于<xref:System.Data.DataSet>或<xref:System.Data.DataTable>返回的对象<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Select%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: If you are using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.FilterExpression%2A> property as a security measure to limit the number of items that are returned, you must validate the parameter values before the filtering occurs.
trans-unit.target: 如果你使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.FilterExpression%2A>属性作为一种安全措施来限制返回，你必须筛选发生之前验证参数值的项的数目。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of parameters that are associated with any parameter placeholders in the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.FilterExpression" /> string.
trans-unit.target: 获取与 <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.FilterExpression" /> 字符串中的任何参数占位符关联的参数的集合。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ParameterCollection" /> that contains a set of parameters associated with any parameter placeholders found in the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.FilterExpression" /> property.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ParameterCollection" />，它包含与在 <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.FilterExpression" /> 属性中找到的任何参数占位符相关联的一组参数。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> control supports filtering data only when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Select%2A> method returns a <xref:System.Data.DataSet> or <xref:System.Data.DataTable> object.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>控件支持筛选数据时，才<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Select%2A>方法返回<xref:System.Data.DataSet>或<xref:System.Data.DataTable>对象。

trans-unit.source: The syntax that is used for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.FilterExpression%2A> is a format string–style expression.
trans-unit.target: 适用于的语法<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.FilterExpression%2A>是一个格式字符串样式表达式。

trans-unit.source: The filter expression syntax is the same syntax that is accepted by the <xref:System.Data.DataColumn.Expression%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 筛选器表达式语法是相同的语法通过接受<xref:System.Data.DataColumn.Expression%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: If you add parameters to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.FilterParameters%2A> collection, you can also include format string placeholders.
trans-unit.target: 如果你将参数添加到<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.FilterParameters%2A>集合，您还可以包含格式字符串占位符。

trans-unit.source: For example, include `"{0}"` in the expression to substitute for parameter values.
trans-unit.target: 例如，包括`"{0}"`中要替换参数值的表达式。

trans-unit.source: The placeholders are replaced according to the index of the parameter in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.FilterParameters%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: 根据中的参数的索引替换占位符<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.FilterParameters%2A>集合。

trans-unit.source: You can include parameters in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.FilterExpression%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 你可以包含在参数<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.FilterExpression%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: If the parameter is a string or character type, enclose the parameter in single quotation marks.
trans-unit.target: 如果参数是字符串或字符类型，请将参数括在单引号。

trans-unit.source: Quotation marks are not required if the parameter is a numeric type.
trans-unit.target: 如果参数是数值类型，则不需要引号引起来。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.FilterParameters%2A> property retrieves the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.FilterParameters%2A> property that is contained by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView> object that is associated with the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.FilterParameters%2A>属性检索<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.FilterParameters%2A>所包含的属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView>与关联的对象<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>控件。

trans-unit.source: This section contains two code examples.
trans-unit.target: 本部分包含两个代码示例。

trans-unit.source: The first code example demonstrates how to display filtered data using an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> object to retrieve data from a middle-tier business object and a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control to display the results.
trans-unit.target: 第一个代码示例演示如何显示使用的筛选的数据<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>对象从中间层业务对象检索数据和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控件来显示结果。

trans-unit.source: The second code example provides an example of a middle-tier business object that is used in the first code example.
trans-unit.target: 第二个代码示例提供第一个代码示例中使用的中间层业务对象的的示例。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to display filtered data using an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> control to retrieve data from a middle-tier business object and a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control to display the results.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何显示使用的筛选的数据<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>控件从中间层业务对象检索数据和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控件来显示结果。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> control can filter data only when the method that retrieves the data retrieves it as a <xref:System.Data.DataSet> or <xref:System.Data.DataTable> object.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>控件可以筛选数据，仅当检索数据的方法检索其作为<xref:System.Data.DataSet>或<xref:System.Data.DataTable>对象。

trans-unit.source: For this reason, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.SelectMethod%2A> property identifies a business object method that retrieves data as a <xref:System.Data.DataSet>.
trans-unit.target: 为此，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.SelectMethod%2A>属性标识的业务对象方法，将数据检索为<xref:System.Data.DataSet>。

trans-unit.source: The code example consists of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBox> control, a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> control, and a **Submit** button.
trans-unit.target: 该代码示例包含的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBox>控件，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控件，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>控件，和一个**提交**按钮。

trans-unit.source: By default, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBox> is populated with the name of one of the Northwind Traders employees.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBox>之一的 Northwind Traders 员工名称填充。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> displays information about the employee that is identified by the name in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBox>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>显示有关由中的名称标识该员工的信息<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBox>。

trans-unit.source: To retrieve data on another employee, in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBox>, enter the full name of the employee, and then click the **Submit** button.
trans-unit.target: 若要检索有关的其他员工，数据在<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBox>，输入该员工的完整名称，然后单击**提交**按钮。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.FilterExpression%2A> property specifies an expression that is used to filter the data that is retrieved by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.SelectMethod%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.FilterExpression%2A>属性指定一个表达式，用于筛选的数据检索到的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.SelectMethod%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: It uses parameter placeholders that are evaluated to the parameters that are contained in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.FilterParameters%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: 它使用其计算结果等于中包含的参数的参数占位符<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.FilterParameters%2A>集合。

trans-unit.source: In this example, the parameter placeholder is bounded by single quotation marks because the type of the parameter is a string type that might contain spaces.
trans-unit.target: 在此示例中，参数占位符受单引号因为参数的类型是一个可能包含空格的字符串类型。

trans-unit.source: If the type of the parameter is a numeric or date type, bounding quotation marks are not required.
trans-unit.target: 如果参数的类型为数值或日期类型，则不需要引号。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.FilterParameters%2A> collection contains one parameter, a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormParameter> object that is bound to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBox> control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.FilterParameters%2A>集合包含一个参数，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormParameter>绑定到的对象<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBox>控件。

trans-unit.source: You should validate any filter parameter value that you receive from the client.
trans-unit.target: 你应验证从客户端接收任何筛选器参数值。

trans-unit.source: The runtime simply substitutes the parameter value into the filter expression and applies it to the <xref:System.Data.DataView> object that is returned by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Select%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 运行时只需将参数值替换到筛选器表达式，并将其应用于<xref:System.Data.DataView>返回的对象<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Select%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: If you are using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.FilterExpression%2A> property as a security measure to limit the number of items that are returned, you must validate the parameter values before the filtering occurs.
trans-unit.target: 如果你使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.FilterExpression%2A>属性作为一种安全措施来限制返回，你必须筛选发生之前验证参数值的项的数目。

trans-unit.source: The following code example provides an example of a middle-tier business object that the preceding code example uses.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例提供前面的代码示例使用中间层业务对象的一个示例。

trans-unit.source: The code example consists of two basic classes:
trans-unit.target: 此代码示例由两个基本类组成：

trans-unit.source: The `EmployeeLogic` class, which is a class that encapsulates business logic.
trans-unit.target: `EmployeeLogic`类，它是封装业务逻辑的类。

trans-unit.source: The `NorthwindEmployee` class, which is a model class that contains only the basic functionality that is required to load and persist data from the data tier.
trans-unit.target: `NorthwindEmployee`类，它是仅包含的基本功能所需进行加载和保持数据层中的数据的模型类。

trans-unit.source: For simplicity, the `EmployeeLogic` class creates a static set of data, rather than retrieving the data from a data tier.
trans-unit.target: 为简单起见，`EmployeeLogic`类创建一组静态的数据，而不是从数据层检索数据。

trans-unit.source: It is also helpful for this example, because the sample relies on you to provide the full name of a Northwind Traders employee to demonstrate filtering.
trans-unit.target: 也很有帮助的此示例中，因为示例依赖于你提供的 Northwind Traders 员工演示筛选的完整名称。

trans-unit.source: For a complete working example, you must compile and use these classes with the Web Forms code examples that are provided.
trans-unit.target: 有关完整的工作示例，必须编译，并使用提供的 Web 窗体代码示例使用这些类。

trans-unit.source: You set the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.FilterExpression" /> property and the <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Select" /> method does not return a <see cref="T:System.Data.DataSet" /> or <see cref="T:System.Data.DataTable" />.
trans-unit.target: 您设置了 <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.FilterExpression" /> 属性，但 <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Select" /> 方法没有返回 <see cref="T:System.Data.DataSet" /> 或 <see cref="T:System.Data.DataTable" />。

trans-unit.source: The name of the view to retrieve.
trans-unit.target: 要检索的视图的名称。

trans-unit.source: Because the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource" /> supports only one view, <c>viewName</c> is ignored.
trans-unit.target: 由于 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource" /> 只支持一个视图，因此 <c>viewName</c> 被忽略。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the named data source view that is associated with the data source control.
trans-unit.target: 检索与数据源控件关联的命名数据源视图。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView" /> named <see langword="DefaultView" /> that is associated with the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource" />.
trans-unit.target: 与 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView" /> 关联的名为 <see langword="DefaultView" /> 的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource" />。
