trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> control supports only one data source view.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>控件支持只有一个数据源视图。

trans-unit.source: As with all data source view objects, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView> that is associated with the data source control defines its capabilities, performs all the work that is necessary to retrieve data from the underlying data storage, and performs operations such as sorting, inserting, deleting, and updating.
trans-unit.target: 与所有数据源视图对象一样，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView>该键相关联的数据源控件定义其功能、 执行的所有工作，需要从基础数据存储中检索数据并都执行如排序，操作插入、 删除和更新。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.GetView%2A> method is intended to be called by data-bound controls, not by page code.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.GetView%2A>方法旨在由数据绑定控件，调用不是由页代码。

trans-unit.source: The specified <paramref name="viewName" /> is <see langword="null" /> or something other than <see langword="DefaultView" />.
trans-unit.target: 指定的 <paramref name="viewName" /> 为 <see langword="null" /> 或 <see langword="DefaultView" /> 以外的值。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves a collection of names representing the list of view objects that are associated with the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 检索名称的集合，这些名称表示与 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource" /> 对象关联的视图对象的列表。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Collections.ICollection" /> that contains the names of the views associated with the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource" />.
trans-unit.target: 包含视图名称的 <see cref="T:System.Collections.ICollection" />，这些视图与 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource" /> 关联。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> control supports only one view, named `DefaultView`, on its underlying data.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>控件支持名为仅一个视图`DefaultView`，针对其基础数据。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.GetViewNames%2A> method returns a single-element collection of this one view name.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.GetViewNames%2A>方法返回一个视图同名的单个元素集合。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.GetViewNames%2A> method is intended to be called by data-bound controls, not by page code.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.GetViewNames%2A>方法旨在由数据绑定控件，调用不是由页代码。

trans-unit.source: Performs an insert operation by calling the method that is identified by the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.InsertMethod" /> property and any parameters in the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.InsertParameters" /> collection.
trans-unit.target: 通过调用由 <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.InsertMethod" /> 属性标识的方法和 <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.InsertParameters" /> 集合中的所有参数，执行插入操作。

trans-unit.source: A value that represents the number of rows inserted into the underlying data storage.
trans-unit.target: 一个表示插入到基础数据存储中的行数的值。

trans-unit.source: Before the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Insert%2A> operation is performed, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.OnInserting%2A> method is called to raise the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Inserting> event.
trans-unit.target: 之前<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Insert%2A>执行操作，则<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.OnInserting%2A>调用方法来引发<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Inserting>事件。

trans-unit.source: You can handle the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Inserting> event to examine the values of the parameters and to perform any preprocessing before an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Insert%2A> operation.
trans-unit.target: 你可以处理<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Inserting>事件，检查的参数的值并执行任何预处理之前<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Insert%2A>操作。

trans-unit.source: To perform an insert operation, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView> object uses reflection to create an instance of the object that is identified by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.TypeName%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要执行插入操作，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView>对象使用反射来创建由标识对象的实例<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.TypeName%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: It then calls the method that is identified by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.InsertMethod%2A> property, using any associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.InsertParameters%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: 它然后调用由标识方法<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.InsertMethod%2A>属性，使用任何关联<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.InsertParameters%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: After the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Insert%2A> operation completes, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.OnInserted%2A> method is called to raise the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Inserted> event.
trans-unit.target: 后<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Insert%2A>操作完成，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.OnInserted%2A>调用方法来引发<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Inserted>事件。

trans-unit.source: You can handle the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Inserted> event to examine any return values, output parameters, and exceptions, and to perform any post-processing.
trans-unit.target: 你可以处理<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Inserted>事件，以检查任何返回值、 输出参数和异常，并执行任何后续处理。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Insert%2A> method delegates to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.Insert%2A> method of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView> that is associated with the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Insert%2A>方法会委托给<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.Insert%2A>方法<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView>关联<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>控件。

trans-unit.source: For more information about parameter merging, object lifetime, and method resolution, see <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.InsertMethod%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 有关参数合并、 对象生存期和方法解析的详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.InsertMethod%2A>。

trans-unit.source: Data-Bound Controls
trans-unit.target: 数据绑定控件

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> object is associated with a data-bound control, such as the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control, it is not necessary to call the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Insert%2A> method from page code.
trans-unit.target: 当<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>对象与之关联的数据绑定控件，如<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控件，不需要调用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Insert%2A>从页的代码的方法。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Insert%2A> method is invoked directly by the data-bound control instead.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Insert%2A>改为直接通过数据绑定控件调用方法。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when an <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Insert" /> operation has completed.
trans-unit.target: 在 <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Insert" /> 操作完成时发生。

trans-unit.source: Handle the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Inserted> event to examine the values of a return value or output parameters, or to determine whether an exception was thrown after an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Insert%2A> operation has completed.
trans-unit.target: 处理<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Inserted>事件检查返回值或输出参数的值，或者想要确定后是否引发了异常<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Insert%2A>操作已完成。

trans-unit.source: The return value, output parameters, and exception handling properties are available from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceStatusEventArgs> object that is associated with the event.
trans-unit.target: 返回值、 输出参数和异常处理属性就可以在<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceStatusEventArgs>与事件相关联的对象。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.source: Occurs before an <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Insert" /> operation.
trans-unit.target: 在 <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Insert" /> 操作前发生。

trans-unit.source: Handle the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Inserting> event to perform additional initialization that is specific to your application, to validate the values of parameters, or to change the parameter values before the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> control performs the insert operation.
trans-unit.target: 处理<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Inserting>事件以执行特定于应用程序，若要验证的值的参数，或更改之前的参数值的附加初始化<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>控件将执行插入操作。

trans-unit.source: The parameters are available as an <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary> collection that is accessed by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceMethodEventArgs.InputParameters%2A> property, which is exposed by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceMethodEventArgs> object.
trans-unit.target: 参数都可用作<xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>集合所访问的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceMethodEventArgs.InputParameters%2A>属性，公开的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceMethodEventArgs>对象。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.source: This section contains two code examples.
trans-unit.target: 本部分包含两个代码示例。

trans-unit.source: The first code example demonstrates how to use an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> object with a business object and a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control to insert data.
trans-unit.target: 第一个代码示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>对象是否与业务对象和一个<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控件插入数据。

trans-unit.source: The second code example provides an example of the middle-tier business object that is used in the first code example.
trans-unit.target: 第二个代码示例提供第一个代码示例中使用的中间层业务对象的的示例。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> control with a business object and a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control to insert data.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>业务对象使用的控件和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控件插入数据。

trans-unit.source: Initially, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> displays a new `NorthwindEmployee` record, along with an automatically generated **Insert** button.
trans-unit.target: 最初，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>显示一个新`NorthwindEmployee`记录，以及自动生成**插入**按钮。

trans-unit.source: After you enter data into the fields of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control, click the **Insert** button.
trans-unit.target: 数据输入到的字段后<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控件中，单击**插入**按钮。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.InsertMethod%2A> property identifies which method performs the insert operation.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.InsertMethod%2A>属性标识哪一种方法执行插入操作。

trans-unit.source: In this example, the `UpdateEmployeeInfo` method is used to perform an insert; however, it requires a `NorthwindEmployee` parameter to insert the data.
trans-unit.target: 在此示例中，`UpdateEmployeeInfo`方法用于执行 insert; 但是，它需要`NorthwindEmployee`参数插入数据。

trans-unit.source: For this reason, the collection of strings that the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control passes automatically is not sufficient.
trans-unit.target: 出于此原因的字符串集合<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控制权将会传递自动是不够的。

trans-unit.source: The `NorthwindEmployeeInserting` delegate is an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceMethodEventHandler> object that handles the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Inserting> event and enables you to manipulate the input parameters before the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Insert%2A> operation proceeds.
trans-unit.target: `NorthwindEmployeeInserting`委托是<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceMethodEventHandler>处理对象<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Inserting>事件并使你能够操作之前的输入的参数<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Insert%2A>操作继续进行。

trans-unit.source: Because the `UpdateEmployeeInfo` method requires a `NorthwindEmployee` object as a parameter, one is created using the collection of strings and is added to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceMethodEventArgs.InputParameters%2A> collection using a parameter name (`ne`) that the method expects.
trans-unit.target: 因为`UpdateEmployeeInfo`方法需要`NorthwindEmployee`对象作为参数，一个创建使用字符串的集合，并添加到<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceMethodEventArgs.InputParameters%2A>使用参数名称的集合 (`ne`) 的方法需要。

trans-unit.source: You might perform steps like these when using an existing middle-tier object as a data source with types and methods that are not designed specifically for use with the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> control.
trans-unit.target: 使用现有的中间层对象作为带有类型和专门用于不设计的方法的数据源时，你可能执行类似这样的步骤<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>控件。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Insert%2A> operation is performed, the method that is identified by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.InsertMethod%2A> property is called.
trans-unit.target: 当<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Insert%2A>执行操作，则由标识的方法<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.InsertMethod%2A>调用属性。

trans-unit.source: If the `Insert` method of the object has a method signature that includes parameters, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.InsertParameters%2A> collection must contain a parameter with names that match the method signature parameters for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Insert%2A> method to complete successfully.
trans-unit.target: 如果`Insert`对象的方法有一个方法签名，包括参数，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.InsertParameters%2A>集合必须包含具有匹配的方法签名参数的名称的参数<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Insert%2A>方法才能成功完成。

trans-unit.source: The following code example provides an example of a middle-tier business object that the preceding code example uses.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例提供前面的代码示例使用中间层业务对象的一个示例。

trans-unit.source: The code example consists of two basic classes:
trans-unit.target: 此代码示例由两个基本类组成：

trans-unit.source: The `EmployeeLogic` class, which is a stateless class that encapsulates business logic.
trans-unit.target: `EmployeeLogic`类，该类是无状态的封装业务逻辑。

trans-unit.source: The `NorthwindEmployee` class, which is a model class that contains only the basic functionality that is required to load and persist data from the data tier.
trans-unit.target: `NorthwindEmployee`类，它是仅包含的基本功能所需进行加载和保持数据层中的数据的模型类。

trans-unit.source: An additional `NorthwindDataException` class is provided as a convenience.
trans-unit.target: 附加`NorthwindDataException`类提供为方便起见。

trans-unit.source: For a complete working example, you must compile and use these classes.
trans-unit.target: 有关完整的工作示例，必须编译，并使用这些类。

trans-unit.source: The `UpdateEmployeeInfo` method is not completely implemented, so you will not insert data into the Northwind Traders database when you experiment with this example.
trans-unit.target: `UpdateEmployeeInfo`方法未完全实现，因此你将不将数据插入 Northwind Traders 数据库时使用此示例进行试验。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name of the method or function that the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource" /> control invokes to insert data.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置由 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource" /> 控件调用以插入数据的方法或函数的名称。

trans-unit.source: A string that represents the name of the method or function that the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource" /> uses to insert data.
trans-unit.target: 一个字符串，表示 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource" /> 用于插入数据的方法或函数的名称。

trans-unit.source: The default is an empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: 默认值为空字符串("")。

trans-unit.source: The business object is assumed to insert data one record at a time, rather than in a batch.
trans-unit.target: 假定的业务对象一次，而不是批处理中插入一条数据记录。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.InsertMethod%2A> property delegates to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.InsertMethod%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView> object that is associated with the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> object.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.InsertMethod%2A>属性委托给<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.InsertMethod%2A>属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView>与关联的对象<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>对象。

trans-unit.source: Object Lifetime
trans-unit.target: 对象生存期

trans-unit.source: The method that is identified by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.InsertMethod%2A> property can be an instance method or a `static` (`Shared` in Visual Basic) method.
trans-unit.target: 由标识的方法<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.InsertMethod%2A>属性可以是实例方法或`static`(`Shared`在 Visual Basic 中) 方法。

trans-unit.source: If it is an instance method, the business object is created and destroyed each time the method specified by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.InsertMethod%2A> property is called.
trans-unit.target: 如果它是实例方法，业务对象创建和销毁指定的方法的每次<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.InsertMethod%2A>调用属性。

trans-unit.source: You can handle the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.ObjectCreated> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.ObjectCreating> events to work with the business object before the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.InsertMethod%2A> property is called.
trans-unit.target: 你可以处理<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.ObjectCreated>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.ObjectCreating>事件以使用在之前的业务对象<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.InsertMethod%2A>调用属性。

trans-unit.source: You can also handle the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.ObjectDisposing> event that is raised after the method that is specified by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.DeleteMethod%2A> property is called.
trans-unit.target: 你还可以处理<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.ObjectDisposing>由指定的方法后，将引发的事件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.DeleteMethod%2A>调用属性。

trans-unit.source: If the business object implements the <xref:System.IDisposable> interface, the <xref:System.IDisposable.Dispose%2A> method is called before the object is destroyed.
trans-unit.target: 如果业务对象实现<xref:System.IDisposable>接口，<xref:System.IDisposable.Dispose%2A>销毁该对象前调用方法。

trans-unit.source: If the method is `static` (`Shared` in Visual Basic), the business object is never created and you cannot handle the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.ObjectCreated>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.ObjectCreating>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.ObjectDisposing> events.
trans-unit.target: 如果该方法是`static`(`Shared`在 Visual Basic 中)，将永远不会创建业务对象，并且无法处理<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.ObjectCreated>， <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.ObjectCreating>，和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.ObjectDisposing>事件。

trans-unit.source: Parameter Merging
trans-unit.target: 合并的参数

trans-unit.source: Parameters are added to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.InsertParameters%2A> collection from three sources:
trans-unit.target: 参数添加到<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.InsertParameters%2A>从三个源的集合：

trans-unit.source: From the data-bound control, at run time.
trans-unit.target: 从数据绑定控件，在运行时。

trans-unit.source: From the `InsertParameters` element, declaratively.
trans-unit.target: 从`InsertParameters`元素，以声明方式。

trans-unit.source: From the `Inserting` method, programmatically.
trans-unit.target: 从`Inserting`方法，以编程方式。

trans-unit.source: First, any parameters that are generated from data-bound controls are added to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.InsertParameters%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: 首先，将通过数据绑定控件生成的任何参数添加到<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.InsertParameters%2A>集合。

trans-unit.source: For example, if the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> control is bound to a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control that has the columns `Name` and `Number`, the parameters for `Name` and `Number` are added to the collection.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>控件绑定到<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>具有列控件`Name`和`Number`的参数`Name`和`Number`添加到集合。

trans-unit.source: The data type of these parameters is `string`.
trans-unit.target: 这些参数的数据类型是`string`。

trans-unit.source: Next, the parameters that are listed in the `InsertParameters` element are added.
trans-unit.target: 下一步、 中列出的参数`InsertParameters`添加元素。

trans-unit.source: If a parameter in the `InsertParameters` element is found with the same name as a parameter that is already in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.InsertParameters%2A> collection, the existing parameter is modified to match the parameter that is specified in the `InsertParameters` element.
trans-unit.target: 如果中的参数`InsertParameters`元素找到具有相同名称作为参数中已被<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.InsertParameters%2A>修改集合，现有的参数以匹配中指定的参数`InsertParameters`元素。

trans-unit.source: Typically, this is used to modify the type of the data in the parameter.
trans-unit.target: 通常，这用于修改在参数中的数据的类型。

trans-unit.source: Finally, you can programmatically add and remove parameters in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Inserting> event, which occurs before the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Insert%2A> method is run.
trans-unit.target: 最后，你可以以编程方式添加和删除中的参数<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Inserting>事件，发生之前<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Insert%2A>运行方法。

trans-unit.source: The method is resolved after the parameters are merged.
trans-unit.target: 对参数进行合并后，该方法将得到解决。

trans-unit.source: Method resolution is discussed in the next section.
trans-unit.target: 在下一部分中讨论方法解析。

trans-unit.source: You should validate any parameter value that you receive from the client.
trans-unit.target: 你应验证从客户端接收任何参数值。

trans-unit.source: The runtime simply substitutes the parameter value into the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.InsertMethod%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 运行时只是将替换参数值转换为<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.InsertMethod%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: Method Resolution
trans-unit.target: 方法解析

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Insert%2A> method is called, the data fields from the data-bound control, the parameters that were created declaratively in the `InsertParameters` element, and the parameters that were added in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Inserting> event handler are all merged.
trans-unit.target: 当<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Insert%2A>调用方法时，从该数据绑定控件中以声明方式创建的参数的数据字段`InsertParameters`元素和参数中的新增<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Inserting>所有合并事件处理程序。

trans-unit.source: (For more information, see the preceding section.) The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> object then attempts to find a method to call.
trans-unit.target: （有关详细信息，请参阅上一节）。<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>对象会尝试查找要调用的方法。

trans-unit.source: First, it looks for one or more methods with the name that is specified in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.InsertMethod%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 首先，它查找一个或多个方法中指定的名称与<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.InsertMethod%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: If no match is found, an <xref:System.InvalidOperationException> exception is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 如果不找到任何匹配项，则<xref:System.InvalidOperationException>引发异常。

trans-unit.source: If a match is found, it then looks for matching parameter names.
trans-unit.target: 如果找到匹配项，则会查找匹配的参数名。

trans-unit.source: For example, suppose a type that is specified by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.TypeName%2A> property has two methods named `InsertARecord`.
trans-unit.target: 例如，假设由指定的类型<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.TypeName%2A>属性有两个方法名为`InsertARecord`。

trans-unit.source: One `InsertARecord` has one parameter, `ID`, and the other `InsertARecord` has two parameters, `Name` and `Number`.
trans-unit.target: 一个`InsertARecord`具有一个参数、 `ID`，以及其他`InsertARecord`具有两个参数，`Name`和`Number`。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.InsertParameters%2A> collection has only one parameter named `ID`, the `InsertARecord` method with just the `ID` parameter is called.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.InsertParameters%2A>集合仅有一个参数名为`ID`、`InsertARecord`方法只需`ID`调用参数。

trans-unit.source: The type of the parameter is not checked in resolving the methods.
trans-unit.target: 参数的类型未签入解决方法。

trans-unit.source: The order of the parameters does not matter.
trans-unit.target: 参数的顺序并不重要。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.DataObjectTypeName%2A> property is set, the method is resolved in a different way.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.DataObjectTypeName%2A>设置属性，以不同的方式解析方法。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> looks for a method with the name that is specified in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.InsertMethod%2A> property that takes one parameter of the type that is specified in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.DataObjectTypeName%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>具有中指定的名称的方法中寻找<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.InsertMethod%2A>属性，它采用一个类型的参数中指定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.DataObjectTypeName%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: In this case, the name of the parameter does not matter.
trans-unit.target: 在这种情况下，参数的名称并不重要。

trans-unit.source: This section contains two code examples.
trans-unit.target: 本部分包含两个代码示例。

trans-unit.source: The first code example demonstrates how to use an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> object with a business object and a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control to insert data.
trans-unit.target: 第一个代码示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>对象是否与业务对象和一个<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控件插入数据。

trans-unit.source: The second code example provides an example of the middle-tier business object that is used in the first code example.
trans-unit.target: 第二个代码示例提供第一个代码示例中使用的中间层业务对象的的示例。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> control with a business object and a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control to insert data.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>业务对象使用的控件和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控件插入数据。

trans-unit.source: Initially, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> displays a new `NorthwindEmployee` record, along with an automatically generated **Insert** button.
trans-unit.target: 最初，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>显示一个新`NorthwindEmployee`记录，以及自动生成**插入**按钮。

trans-unit.source: After you enter data into the fields of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control, click the **Insert** button.
trans-unit.target: 数据输入到的字段后<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控件中，单击**插入**按钮。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.InsertMethod%2A> property identifies which method performs the insert operation.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.InsertMethod%2A>属性标识哪一种方法执行插入操作。

trans-unit.source: In this example, the `UpdateEmployeeInfo` method is used to perform an insert; however, it requires a `NorthwindEmployee` parameter to insert the data.
trans-unit.target: 在此示例中，`UpdateEmployeeInfo`方法用于执行 insert; 但是，它需要`NorthwindEmployee`参数插入数据。

trans-unit.source: For this reason, the collection of strings that the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control passes automatically is not sufficient.
trans-unit.target: 出于此原因的字符串集合<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控制权将会传递自动是不够的。

trans-unit.source: The `NorthwindEmployeeInserting` delegate is an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceMethodEventHandler> object that handles the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Inserting> event and enables you to manipulate the input parameters before the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Insert%2A> operation proceeds.
trans-unit.target: `NorthwindEmployeeInserting`委托是<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceMethodEventHandler>处理对象<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Inserting>事件并使你能够操作之前的输入的参数<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Insert%2A>操作继续进行。

trans-unit.source: Because the `UpdateEmployeeInfo` method requires a `NorthwindEmployee` object as a parameter, one is created using the collection of strings and is added to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceMethodEventArgs.InputParameters%2A> collection using a parameter name (`ne`) that the method expects.
trans-unit.target: 因为`UpdateEmployeeInfo`方法需要`NorthwindEmployee`对象作为参数，一个创建使用字符串的集合，并添加到<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceMethodEventArgs.InputParameters%2A>使用参数名称的集合 (`ne`) 的方法需要。

trans-unit.source: You might perform steps like these when using an existing middle-tier object as a data source with types and methods that are not designed specifically for use with the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> control.
trans-unit.target: 使用现有的中间层对象作为带有类型和专门用于不设计的方法的数据源时，你可能执行类似这样的步骤<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>控件。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Insert%2A> operation is performed, the method that is identified by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.InsertMethod%2A> property is called.
trans-unit.target: 当<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Insert%2A>执行操作，则由标识的方法<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.InsertMethod%2A>调用属性。

trans-unit.source: If the `Insert` method of the object has a method signature that includes parameters, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.InsertParameters%2A> collection must contain a parameter with names that match the method signature parameters for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Insert%2A> method to complete successfully.
trans-unit.target: 如果`Insert`对象的方法有一个方法签名，包括参数，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.InsertParameters%2A>集合必须包含具有匹配的方法签名参数的名称的参数<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Insert%2A>方法才能成功完成。

trans-unit.source: The following code example provides an example of a middle-tier business object that the preceding code example uses.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例提供前面的代码示例使用中间层业务对象的一个示例。

trans-unit.source: The code example consists of two basic classes:
trans-unit.target: 此代码示例由两个基本类组成：

trans-unit.source: The `EmployeeLogic` class, which is a stateless class that encapsulates business logic.
trans-unit.target: `EmployeeLogic`类，该类是无状态的封装业务逻辑。

trans-unit.source: The `NorthwindEmployee` class, which is a model class that contains only the basic functionality that is required to load and persist data from the data tier.
trans-unit.target: `NorthwindEmployee`类，它是仅包含的基本功能所需进行加载和保持数据层中的数据的模型类。

trans-unit.source: An additional `NorthwindDataException` class is provided as a convenience.
trans-unit.target: 附加`NorthwindDataException`类提供为方便起见。

trans-unit.source: For a complete working example, you must compile and use these classes.
trans-unit.target: 有关完整的工作示例，必须编译，并使用这些类。

trans-unit.source: The `UpdateEmployeeInfo` method is not completely implemented, so you will not insert data into the Northwind Traders database when you experiment with this example.
trans-unit.target: `UpdateEmployeeInfo`方法未完全实现，因此你将不将数据插入 Northwind Traders 数据库时使用此示例进行试验。

trans-unit.source: Gets the parameters collection that contains the parameters that are used by the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.InsertMethod" /> property.
trans-unit.target: 获取参数集合，该集合包含由 <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.InsertMethod" /> 属性使用的参数。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ParameterCollection" /> that contains the parameters used by the method identified by the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.InsertMethod" /> property.
trans-unit.target: 包含由 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ParameterCollection" /> 属性标识的方法所使用的参数的 <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.InsertMethod" />。

trans-unit.source: The names and types of the parameters that are contained in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.InsertParameters%2A> collection must match the names and types of the parameters that are in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.InsertMethod%2A> property signature.
trans-unit.target: 名称和中包含的参数类型<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.InsertParameters%2A>集合的名称和中的参数类型必须匹配<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.InsertMethod%2A>属性签名。

trans-unit.source: The parameter names are case sensitive.
trans-unit.target: 参数名称区分大小写。

trans-unit.source: When working with data-bound controls that supply parameters, such as the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> controls, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> control automatically merges any parameters that are explicitly specified in the collection with the parameters that are provided by the data-bound control.
trans-unit.target: 使用提供参数，如数据绑定控件时<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控件，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>控件自动合并带有参数的集合中显式指定任何参数提供的数据绑定控件。

trans-unit.source: This is important because data-bound controls always supply their parameters as <xref:System.String> types, and if the method signature includes numeric or date types, you must explicitly include a parameter in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.InsertParameters%2A> collection with the correct type.
trans-unit.target: 这是重要的因为数据绑定控件始终提供其参数作为<xref:System.String>类型，并且，如果方法签名包含数字或日期类型，你必须显式包含中的参数<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.InsertParameters%2A>与正确的类型的集合。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> control attempts to cast the parameters according to the type that is defined by the parameters in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 否则为<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>控件尝试根据集合中的参数定义的类型参数强制转换。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Using Parameters with the ObjectDataSource Control](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/45fb67ee-9be7-49b7-9421-e242203dafa4).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[ObjectDataSource 控件与使用参数](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/45fb67ee-9be7-49b7-9421-e242203dafa4)。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.InsertParameters%2A> property retrieves the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.InsertParameters%2A> property that is contained by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView> that is associated with the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.InsertParameters%2A>属性检索<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.InsertParameters%2A>所包含的属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView>关联<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>控件。

trans-unit.source: For more information about parameter merging, object lifetime, and method resolution, see <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.InsertMethod%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 有关参数合并、 对象生存期和方法解析的详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.InsertMethod%2A>。

trans-unit.source: This section contains two code examples.
trans-unit.target: 本部分包含两个代码示例。

trans-unit.source: The first code example demonstrates how to use an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> object with a business object and a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control to insert data.
trans-unit.target: 第一个代码示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>对象是否与业务对象和一个<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控件插入数据。

trans-unit.source: The second code example provides an example implementation of the `Insert` method that is used in the first code example.
trans-unit.target: 第二个代码示例提供的示例实现`Insert`第一个代码示例中使用的方法。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> control with a business object and a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control to insert data.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>业务对象使用的控件和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控件插入数据。

trans-unit.source: Initially, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> displays text boxes in which you can enter data for a new `NorthwindEmployee` record, along with an automatically generated **Insert** button.
trans-unit.target: 最初，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>显示文本框中，你可以在其中输入对新的数据`NorthwindEmployee`记录，以及自动生成**插入**按钮。

trans-unit.source: After you enter data into the fields of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control, click the **Insert** button.
trans-unit.target: 数据输入到的字段后<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控件中，单击**插入**按钮。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.InsertMethod%2A> property identifies which method performs the insert operation.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.InsertMethod%2A>属性标识哪一种方法执行插入操作。

trans-unit.source: If you click the **Insert** button, the operation is performed using the method that is specified by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.InsertMethod%2A> property and any parameters that are specified in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.InsertParameters%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: 如果你单击**插入**按钮，该操作使用由指定的方法来执行<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.InsertMethod%2A>属性和中指定任何参数<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.InsertParameters%2A>集合。

trans-unit.source: In this code example, one parameter is specified in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.InsertParameters%2A> collection that corresponds to the supervisor's ID.
trans-unit.target: 在此代码示例中，一个参数中指定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.InsertParameters%2A>对应监护人的 ID 的集合

trans-unit.source: This is because even though the ID is displayed in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.Rows%2A> collection for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control as a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField> object, it is passed as a string to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> control.
trans-unit.target: 这是因为即使的 ID 显示在<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.Rows%2A>集合<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控件用作<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField>对象，它将作为连接到的字符串传递<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>控件。

trans-unit.source: By adding it explicitly to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.InsertParameters%2A> collection with a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter.Type%2A> property set to the <xref:System.TypeCode.Int32> value, it will be passed correctly by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> to the method as an <xref:System.Int32>, not as a string.
trans-unit.target: 通过将它添加到显式<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.InsertParameters%2A>具有集合<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter.Type%2A>属性设置为<xref:System.TypeCode.Int32>值，它将传递正确通过<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>到该方法为<xref:System.Int32>，而不是一个字符串。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Insert%2A> operation is performed, the method that is identified by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.InsertMethod%2A> property is called.
trans-unit.target: 当<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Insert%2A>执行操作，则由标识的方法<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.InsertMethod%2A>调用属性。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Insert%2A> method of the object has a method signature that includes parameters, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.InsertParameters%2A> collection must contain parameters that have names that match the method signature parameters for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Insert%2A> method to complete successfully.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Insert%2A>对象的方法有一个方法签名，包括参数，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.InsertParameters%2A>集合必须包含具有与匹配的方法签名参数名称的参数<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Insert%2A>方法才能成功完成。

trans-unit.source: You should validate any parameter value that you receive from the client.
trans-unit.target: 你应验证从客户端接收任何参数值。

trans-unit.source: The runtime simply substitutes the parameter value into the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.InsertMethod%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 运行时只是将替换参数值转换为<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.InsertMethod%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: The following code example provides an example implementation of the `Insert` method that the preceding code example uses.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例提供的示例实现`Insert`前面的代码示例使用的方法。

trans-unit.source: The `InsertNewEmployeeWrapper` method is added to the `EmployeeLogic` middle-tier object that is provided in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> class overview to enable the object to work more easily with the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> control in Web scenarios, without a substantial rewrite to the actual business logic.
trans-unit.target: `InsertNewEmployeeWrapper`方法添加到`EmployeeLogic`中提供的中间层对象<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>类概述，以使对象可以更轻松地使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>中 Web 方案，而不必大量改写的实际控件业务逻辑。

trans-unit.source: To run the example, you must have the `NorthwindEmployee` class that is provided in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> class overview.
trans-unit.target: 若要运行该示例，你必须`NorthwindEmployee`中提供的类<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>类概述。

trans-unit.source: This example illustrates only how to connect the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> to a business object method that gets data for a new database record by using parameters.
trans-unit.target: 此示例演示如何仅如何连接<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>到业务对象方法，可获取新的数据库记录中使用的参数数据。

trans-unit.source: The example does not add records to the database, because the `Save` method of the `NorthwindEmployee` class does not include code to update the database.
trans-unit.target: 该示例因为不会添加记录到数据库，`Save`方法`NorthwindEmployee`类不包括代码以更新数据库。

trans-unit.source: An object that contains the saved view state values for the control.
trans-unit.target: 包含控件的已保存视图状态值的对象。

trans-unit.source: Loads the previously saved view state of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 加载以前保存的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource" /> 控件的视图状态。

trans-unit.source: This method is used primarily by the .NET Framework infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.
trans-unit.target: 此方法主要由.NET Framework 基础结构使用，但不可在代码中直接使用。

trans-unit.source: However, control developers can override this method to specify how a custom server control restores its view state.
trans-unit.target: 但是，控件开发人员可以重写此方法以指定自定义服务器控件还原其视图状态的方式。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [ASP.NET State Management Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0218d965-5d30-445b-b6a6-8870e70e63ce).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET 状态管理概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0218d965-5d30-445b-b6a6-8870e70e63ce)。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.LoadViewState%2A> method is used to load the previously saved view state of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.LoadViewState%2A>方法用于加载以前保存的视图状态的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>控件。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.LoadViewState(System.Object)" /> method is used primarily by control developers when extending the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource" /> control.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.LoadViewState(System.Object)" />扩展时，主要由控件开发人员使用的方法<see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource" />控件。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name of the business object data retrieval method parameter that is used to indicate the number of records to retrieve for data source paging support.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置业务对象数据检索方法参数的名称，该参数用于指示要检索的数据源分页支持的记录数。

trans-unit.source: The name of the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.SelectMethod" /> parameter that is used to indicate the number of records to retrieve.
trans-unit.target: 用于指示要检索的记录数的 <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.SelectMethod" /> 参数名。

trans-unit.source: The default is <c>"maximumRows"</c>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<c>"值"</c>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.MaximumRowsParameterName%2A> property is used to support data source paging.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.MaximumRowsParameterName%2A>属性用于支持数据源分页。

trans-unit.source: For information about how paging is supported by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> control, see <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.EnablePaging%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 有关如何通过支持分页信息<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>控制，请参阅<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.EnablePaging%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.MaximumRowsParameterName%2A> property delegates to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.MaximumRowsParameterName%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView> object that is associated with the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.MaximumRowsParameterName%2A>属性委托给<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.MaximumRowsParameterName%2A>属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView>与关联的对象<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>控件。

trans-unit.source: The following three examples show a Web page, a code-behind page class, and a data-access class that enable the user to pick how many records are displayed in the page.
trans-unit.target: 以下三个示例显示一个网页、 代码隐藏页类，并使用户能够选择多少条记录显示在页中的数据访问类。

trans-unit.source: The Web page contains an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> control whose <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.EnablePaging%2A> property is set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 网页包含<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>控制其<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.EnablePaging%2A>属性设置为`true`。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.SelectCountMethod%2A> property is set to the name of a method that returns the total number of records in the query.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.SelectCountMethod%2A>属性设置为在查询中返回的记录总数的方法的名称。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.MaximumRowsParameterName%2A> property and the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.StartRowIndexParameterName%2A> property are set to the names of the parameters that are used in the Select method.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.MaximumRowsParameterName%2A>属性和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.StartRowIndexParameterName%2A>属性设置为选择的方法中使用的参数的名称。

trans-unit.source: The page also contains a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DropDownList> control.
trans-unit.target: 此页还包含<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DropDownList>控件。

trans-unit.source: The second example shows a handler for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.SelectedIndexChanged?displayProperty=nameWithType> event of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DropDownList> control.
trans-unit.target: 第二个示例显示的处理程序<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.SelectedIndexChanged?displayProperty=nameWithType>事件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DropDownList>控件。

trans-unit.source: The code in the handler sets the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.PageSize%2A> property to the user's selection.
trans-unit.target: 中的处理程序集的代码<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.PageSize%2A>于用户的所选内容的属性。

trans-unit.source: The third example shows the data access class that retrieves data from the Customers table.
trans-unit.target: 在第三个示例从 Customers 表中检索数据的数据访问类。

trans-unit.source: It includes a method named `GetSubsetOfEmployees`, which is assigned to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.SelectMethod%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> control.
trans-unit.target: 它包括一个名为方法`GetSubsetOfEmployees`，分配给<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.SelectMethod%2A>属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>控件。

trans-unit.source: The example also includes a method named `GetEmployeeCount`, which is assigned to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.SelectCountMethod%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> control.
trans-unit.target: 该示例还包括一个名为方法`GetEmployeeCount`，分配给<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.SelectCountMethod%2A>属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>控件。

trans-unit.source: The class uses LINQ to query the Customers table.
trans-unit.target: 类使用 LINQ 查询客户表。

trans-unit.source: The example requires a LINQ to SQL class that represents the Northwind database and Customers table.
trans-unit.target: 该示例需要 LINQ to SQL 类，表示 Northwind 数据库和 Customers 表。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [How to: Create LINQ to SQL Classes in a Web Project](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/20bf925f-2a6d-410d-8f65-7b5b8f555081).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[如何： 创建 LINQ to SQL 类 Web 项目中](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/20bf925f-2a6d-410d-8f65-7b5b8f555081)。

trans-unit.source: Occurs after the object that is identified by the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.TypeName" /> property is created.
trans-unit.target: 在创建由 <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.TypeName" /> 属性标识的对象之后发生。

trans-unit.source: Handle the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.ObjectCreated> event to call other methods on the business object, set properties, or perform other initialization that is specific to the business object before the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> object calls the business object data method to perform a data operation.
trans-unit.target: 处理<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.ObjectCreated>事件调用其他方法在业务对象上设置属性，或执行其他特定于之前的业务对象的初始化<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>对象调用业务对象数据方法来执行数据操作.

trans-unit.source: A reference to the object is accessed by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceEventArgs.ObjectInstance%2A> property, which is exposed by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceEventArgs> object.
trans-unit.target: 对对象的引用可通过<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceEventArgs.ObjectInstance%2A>属性，公开的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceEventArgs>对象。

trans-unit.source: If the method that is identified to perform the data operation is `static` (`Shared` in Visual Basic), the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.ObjectCreating> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.ObjectCreated> events are never raised.
trans-unit.target: 如果标识以执行数据操作的方法是`static`(`Shared`在 Visual Basic 中)，则<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.ObjectCreating>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.ObjectCreated>永远不会引发事件。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.source: Occurs before the object that is identified by the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.TypeName" /> property is created.
trans-unit.target: 在创建由 <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.TypeName" /> 属性标识的对象之前发生。

trans-unit.source: If the method that is identified to perform the data operation is `static` (`Shared` in Visual Basic), the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.ObjectCreating> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.ObjectCreated> events are never raised.
trans-unit.target: 如果标识以执行数据操作的方法是`static`(`Shared`在 Visual Basic 中)，则<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.ObjectCreating>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.ObjectCreated>永远不会引发事件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> control automatically calls the default constructor of a business object to create an instance of it using reflection.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>控件将自动调用默认构造函数的业务对象来创建它使用反射的实例。

trans-unit.source: Handle the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.ObjectCreating> event to explicitly call another constructor, and set the instance of the object that results to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceEventArgs.ObjectInstance%2A> property of the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceEventArgs> object.
trans-unit.target: 处理<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.ObjectCreating>事件来显式调用另一个构造函数，并将结果传递给对象的实例设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceEventArgs.ObjectInstance%2A>属性关联的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceEventArgs>对象。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.source: This section contains two code examples.
trans-unit.target: 本部分包含两个代码示例。

trans-unit.source: The first code example demonstrates how to use an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> object with a business object and a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control to display information.
trans-unit.target: 第一个代码示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>对象是否与业务对象和一个<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控件来显示信息。

trans-unit.source: The second code example provides the middle-tier business object that is used in the first code example.
trans-unit.target: 第二个代码示例提供第一个代码示例中使用的中间层业务对象。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> control with a business object and a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control to display information.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>业务对象使用的控件和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控件来显示信息。

trans-unit.source: You might work with a business object that is very expensive to create (in terms of time or resources) for every data operation your Web page performs.
trans-unit.target: 你可能使用业务对象是很大的开销 （在方面时间或资源） 创建 Web 页执行的每个数据操作。

trans-unit.source: One way to work with an expensive object might be to create an instance of it once, and then cache it for subsequent operations instead of creating and destroying it for every data operation.
trans-unit.target: 若要使用的高开销对象的一种方法可能是一次，创建它的实例，然后缓存它用于后续操作，而不是创建和销毁它执行每个数据操作。

trans-unit.source: In a production application, multiple requests might end up simultaneously using the same instance.
trans-unit.target: 在生产应用程序，多个请求可能最终会同时使用同一个实例。

trans-unit.source: Therefore, the object needs to be implemented in a thread-safe manner.
trans-unit.target: 因此，需要采用线程安全的方式实现的对象。

trans-unit.source: This code example demonstrates this pattern.
trans-unit.target: 此代码示例演示此模式。

trans-unit.source: You can handle the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.ObjectCreating> event to check the cache for an object first, and only create an instance of the object, if one is not already cached.
trans-unit.target: 你可以处理<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.ObjectCreating>事件，首先，检查对象的缓存，并仅创建的对象的实例，如果尚未缓存。

trans-unit.source: Then, handle the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.ObjectDisposing> event to cache the business object for future use, instead of destroying it.
trans-unit.target: 然后，处理<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.ObjectDisposing>事件以缓存供将来使用，而不是销毁它的业务对象。

trans-unit.source: In this code example, the <xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel?displayProperty=nameWithType> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDisposingEventArgs> object is set to `true` to direct the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> to not call <xref:System.IDisposable.Dispose%2A> method on the object.
trans-unit.target: 在此代码示例中，<xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel?displayProperty=nameWithType>属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDisposingEventArgs>对象设置为`true`定向<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>不要调用<xref:System.IDisposable.Dispose%2A>对象上的方法。

trans-unit.source: The following code example provides the example middle-tier business object that the preceding code example uses.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例提供前面的代码示例使用的示例中间层业务对象。

trans-unit.source: The code example consists of a basic business object, defined by the `EmployeeLogic` class, which is a stateful class that encapsulates business logic.
trans-unit.target: 该代码示例包含的基本业务对象，由定义`EmployeeLogic`类，它是封装业务逻辑的有状态类。

trans-unit.source: For a complete working example, you must compile this code as a library and use these classes from an ASP.NET page (.aspx file).
trans-unit.target: 有关完整的工作示例，必须编译为库此代码，并使用这些类从 ASP.NET 页 （.aspx 文件）。

trans-unit.source: Occurs before the object that is identified by the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.TypeName" /> property is discarded.
trans-unit.target: 在丢弃由 <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.TypeName" /> 属性标识的对象之前发生。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.ObjectDisposing> event is always raised before the instance of the business object is discarded.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.ObjectDisposing>丢弃业务对象的实例之前，始终将引发事件。

trans-unit.source: If the business object implements the <xref:System.IDisposable> interface, the <xref:System.IDisposable.Dispose%2A> method is called after this event is raised.
trans-unit.target: 如果业务对象实现<xref:System.IDisposable>接口，<xref:System.IDisposable.Dispose%2A>方法之后将引发此事件被调用。

trans-unit.source: Handle the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.ObjectDisposing> event to call other methods on the object, set properties, or perform clean-up that is specific to the object before the object is destroyed.
trans-unit.target: 处理<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.ObjectDisposing>事件调用其他方法调用的对象上设置属性，或执行清理该对象被销毁之前即特定于该对象。

trans-unit.source: A reference to the object is accessed by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceEventArgs.ObjectInstance%2A> property, which is exposed by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceEventArgs> object.
trans-unit.target: 对对象的引用可通过<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceEventArgs.ObjectInstance%2A>属性，公开的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceEventArgs>对象。

trans-unit.source: When you use a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> control with a LINQ to SQL class, you must cancel the disposing of the data-context class in an handler for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.ObjectDisposing> event.
trans-unit.target: 当你使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>控件使用 LINQ to SQL 类，你必须取消的处理程序中的数据上下文类的释放<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.ObjectDisposing>事件。

trans-unit.source: This step is necessary because LINQ to SQL supports deferred execution, whereas the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> control tries to dispose the data context after the Select operation.
trans-unit.target: 此步骤是必需的因为 LINQ to SQL 支持延迟的执行，而<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>控件尝试后选择操作释放的数据上下文。

trans-unit.source: For more information about how to handle events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 有关如何处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.source: This section contains two code examples.
trans-unit.target: 本部分包含两个代码示例。

trans-unit.source: The first code example demonstrates how to use an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> object with a business object and a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control to display information.
trans-unit.target: 第一个代码示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>对象是否与业务对象和一个<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控件来显示信息。

trans-unit.source: The second code example provides the middle-tier business object that is used in the first code example.
trans-unit.target: 第二个代码示例提供第一个代码示例中使用的中间层业务对象。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> control with a business object and a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control to display information.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>业务对象使用的控件和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控件来显示信息。

trans-unit.source: You might work with a business object that is very expensive to create (in terms of time or resources) for every data operation your Web page performs.
trans-unit.target: 你可能使用业务对象是很大的开销 （在方面时间或资源） 创建 Web 页执行的每个数据操作。

trans-unit.source: One way to work with an expensive object might be to create an instance of it once, and then cache it for subsequent operations instead of creating and destroying it for every data operation.
trans-unit.target: 若要使用的高开销对象的一种方法可能是一次，创建它的实例，然后缓存它用于后续操作，而不是创建和销毁它执行每个数据操作。

trans-unit.source: This example demonstrates this pattern.
trans-unit.target: 此示例演示此模式。

trans-unit.source: You can handle the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.ObjectCreating> event to check the cache for an object first, and only create an instance of it, if one is not already cached.
trans-unit.target: 你可以处理<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.ObjectCreating>事件，首先，检查对象的缓存并只能创建它的实例，如果尚未缓存。

trans-unit.source: Then, handle the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.ObjectDisposing> event to cache the business object for future use, instead of destroying it.
trans-unit.target: 然后，处理<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.ObjectDisposing>事件以缓存供将来使用，而不是销毁它的业务对象。

trans-unit.source: In this code example, the <xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel?displayProperty=nameWithType> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDisposingEventArgs> object is set to `true` to direct the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> to not call the <xref:System.IDisposable.Dispose%2A> method on the object.
trans-unit.target: 在此代码示例中，<xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel?displayProperty=nameWithType>属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDisposingEventArgs>对象设置为`true`定向<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>不要调用<xref:System.IDisposable.Dispose%2A>对象上的方法。

trans-unit.source: The following code example provides the example middle-tier business object that the preceding code example uses.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例提供前面的代码示例使用的示例中间层业务对象。

trans-unit.source: The code example consists of a basic business object, defined by the `EmployeeLogic` class, which is a stateful class that encapsulates business logic.
trans-unit.target: 该代码示例包含的基本业务对象，由定义`EmployeeLogic`类，它是封装业务逻辑的有状态类。

trans-unit.source: For a complete working example, you must compile this code as a library and use these classes from an ASP.NET page (.aspx file).
trans-unit.target: 有关完整的工作示例，必须编译为库此代码，并使用这些类从 ASP.NET 页 （.aspx 文件）。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to handle the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.ObjectDisposing> event when using an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> control with a LINQ to SQL class.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何处理<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.ObjectDisposing>事件时使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>使用 LINQ to SQL 类的控件。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a format string to apply to the names of the parameters for original values that are passed to the <see langword="Delete" /> or <see langword="Update" /> methods.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个格式字符串，该字符串应用于传递给 <see langword="Delete" /> 或 <see langword="Update" /> 方法的原始值的参数名称。

trans-unit.source: A string that represents a format string applied to the names of any <paramref name="oldValues" /> or key parameters passed to the <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Delete" /> or <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Update" /> methods.
trans-unit.target: 一个表示格式字符串的字符串，它应用于传递给 <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Delete" /> 或 <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Update" /> 方法的任何 <paramref name="oldValues" /> 或键参数的名称。

trans-unit.source: The default is <c>"{0}"</c>, which means the parameter name is the field name.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<c>"{0}"</c>，这意味着参数名称是字段名称。

trans-unit.source: The value of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.OldValuesParameterFormatString%2A> property is applied to primary keys only, such as those that are identified with the `DataKeyNames` property of a data-bound control, or in delete and update scenarios where the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.ConflictDetection%2A> property is set to the <xref:System.Web.UI.ConflictOptions.CompareAllValues> value, and the set of original values are passed to the corresponding data method.
trans-unit.target: 值<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.OldValuesParameterFormatString%2A>属性如那些使用标识应用于仅，主键`DataKeyNames`属性的数据绑定控件，或在删除和更新方案其中<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.ConflictDetection%2A>属性设置为<xref:System.Web.UI.ConflictOptions.CompareAllValues>值和原始值的集将传递到相应的数据方法。

trans-unit.source: The following are two common scenarios where you might change the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.OldValuesParameterFormatString%2A> property:
trans-unit.target: 以下是两个常见的方案，你可能要更改<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.OldValuesParameterFormatString%2A>属性：

trans-unit.source: You might want to change the property to differentiate between old and new values in updates.
trans-unit.target: 你可能想要更改属性，以区分中更新的旧和新值。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.ConflictDetection%2A> property is set to the <xref:System.Web.UI.ConflictOptions.CompareAllValues> value, parameters for both the original and new values are added to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.UpdateParameters%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: 当<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.ConflictDetection%2A>属性设置为<xref:System.Web.UI.ConflictOptions.CompareAllValues>值，参数的原始列值和新值添加到<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.UpdateParameters%2A>集合。

trans-unit.source: Without the formatting string, two parameters with the same name would be created for each data field.
trans-unit.target: 没有格式设置字符串，将为每个数据字段创建具有相同名称的两个参数。

trans-unit.source: By changing the name of the original value parameter, you can compare the data to the original data source to detect conflicts and compare key values.
trans-unit.target: 通过更改原始值参数的名称，你可以比较到原始的数据源，以检测冲突并比较键值的数据。

trans-unit.source: Some visual designers implement a particular naming scheme for original values and keys.
trans-unit.target: 某些可视化设计器实现原始值和键的特定命名的方案。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.OldValuesParameterFormatString%2A> property delegates to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.OldValuesParameterFormatString%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView> object that is associated with the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.OldValuesParameterFormatString%2A>属性委托给<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.OldValuesParameterFormatString%2A>属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView>与关联的对象<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>控件。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.EventArgs" /> that contains event data.
trans-unit.target: 包含事件数据的 <see cref="T:System.EventArgs" />。

trans-unit.source: Adds a <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.Page.LoadComplete" /> event handler to the page that contains the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 将 <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.Page.LoadComplete" /> 事件处理程序添加到包含 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource" /> 控件的页。

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.OnInit%2A> method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.OnInit%2A> 方法还允许派生类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。

trans-unit.source: When overriding the <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.OnInit(System.EventArgs)" /> method in a derived class, be sure to call the <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.Control.OnInit(System.EventArgs)" /> method for the base class so that registered delegates receive the event.
trans-unit.target: 在重写<see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.OnInit(System.EventArgs)" />方法在派生类中，一定要调用<see cref="M:System.Web.UI.Control.OnInit(System.EventArgs)" />方法的基类，以便已注册的委托对事件进行接收。

trans-unit.source: Gets a or sets a value that indicates what culture information is used when converting string values to actual property types in order to construct an object of the type indicated by <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.DataObjectTypeName" />.
trans-unit.target: 当将字符串值转换为实际属性类型来构造由 <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.DataObjectTypeName" /> 指示的对象类型时，获取或设置表示哪些区域性信息被用了的值。

trans-unit.source: The culture information.
trans-unit.target: 区域性信息。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see cref="F:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ParsingCulture.Invariant" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see cref="F:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ParsingCulture.Invariant" />。

trans-unit.source: Saves the state of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 保存 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource" /> 控件的状态。

trans-unit.source: Returns the server control's current view state; otherwise, returns <see langword="null" />, if there is no view state associated with the control.
trans-unit.target: 返回服务器控件的当前视图状态；如果没有与此控件关联的视图状态，则返回 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves data from the underlying data storage by calling the method that is identified by the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.SelectMethod" /> property with the parameters in the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.SelectParameters" /> collection.
trans-unit.target: 通过用 <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.SelectMethod" /> 集合中的参数调用由 <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.SelectParameters" /> 属性标识的方法，从基础数据存储中检索数据。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Collections.IEnumerable" /> list of data rows.
trans-unit.target: 一个数据行的 <see cref="T:System.Collections.IEnumerable" /> 列表。

trans-unit.source: The specified method might have any method signature, but it must return or be derived from one of the types listed in the following table for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> control to call it successfully.
trans-unit.target: 指定的方法可能具有任何方法签名，但它必须返回或派生自的以下表中列出的类型之一<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>控件，若要成功调用。

trans-unit.source: Return type
trans-unit.target: 返回类型

trans-unit.source: Action
trans-unit.target: 操作

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable> is returned by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Select%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable>返回<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Select%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Data.DataView> is created by using the <xref:System.Data.DataTable> and returned by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Select%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Data.DataView>通过创建<xref:System.Data.DataTable>以及返回<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Select%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.DataView> is returned by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Select%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Data.DataView>返回<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Select%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The first <xref:System.Data.DataTable> of the <xref:System.Data.DataSet> is extracted and a <xref:System.Data.DataView> is created and returned by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Select%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 第一个<xref:System.Data.DataTable>的<xref:System.Data.DataSet>提取和<xref:System.Data.DataView>创建并返回<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Select%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The object is wrapped in a one-element <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable> collection and returned by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Select%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 该对象包装在一个元素<xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable>集合并返回<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Select%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The method that is identified by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.SelectMethod%2A> property can be an instance method or a `static` (`Shared` in Visual Basic) method.
trans-unit.target: 由标识的方法<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.SelectMethod%2A>属性可以是实例方法或`static`(`Shared`在 Visual Basic 中) 方法。

trans-unit.source: If it is an instance method, the business object is created and destroyed each time the method that is specified by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.SelectMethod%2A> property is called, except that the same instance is used to call the method that is specified by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.SelectMethod%2A> property and the method that is specified by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.SelectCountMethod%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 如果它是实例方法，业务对象创建和销毁由指定的方法的每次<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.SelectMethod%2A>属性称为，只不过使用同一个实例调用的方法的指定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.SelectMethod%2A>属性和通过指定的方法<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.SelectCountMethod%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Select%2A> method returns an <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable> interface.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Select%2A>方法返回<xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable>接口。

trans-unit.source: However, to enable caching and filtering scenarios, the return value must be a <xref:System.Data.DataSet> object.
trans-unit.target: 但是，若要启用缓存和筛选方案，返回的值必须是<xref:System.Data.DataSet>对象。

trans-unit.source: While the <xref:System.Data.DataSet> class does not implement the <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable> interface, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> control automatically extracts the default <xref:System.Data.DataView> control, which implements the <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable>.
trans-unit.target: 虽然<xref:System.Data.DataSet>类未实现<xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable>接口，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>控件自动提取默认<xref:System.Data.DataView>控制，该类实现<xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable>。

trans-unit.source: Before the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Select%2A> operation is performed, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.OnSelecting%2A> method is called to raise the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Selecting> event.
trans-unit.target: 之前<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Select%2A>执行操作，则<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.OnSelecting%2A>调用方法来引发<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Selecting>事件。

trans-unit.source: You can handle the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Selecting> event to examine the values of the parameters and to perform any preprocessing before a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Select%2A> operation.
trans-unit.target: 你可以处理<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Selecting>事件，检查的参数的值并执行任何预处理之前<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Select%2A>操作。

trans-unit.source: To perform a data retrieval operation, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView> object uses reflection to create an instance of the object that is identified by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.TypeName%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要执行数据检索操作，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView>对象使用反射来创建由标识对象的实例<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.TypeName%2A>属性。
